2:283.t: Wa-in kuntum AAala safarin walamtajidoo katiban farihanun maqboodatun fa-inamina baAAdukum baAAdan falyu-addiallatheei/tumina amanatahu walyattaqi Allaha rabbahuwala taktumoo ashshahadata waman yaktumhafa-innahu athimun qalbuhu wallahu bimataAAmaloona AAaleem

2:284.t: Lillahi ma fee assamawatiwama fee al-ardi wa-in tubdoo ma feeanfusikum aw tukhfoohu yuhasibkum bihi Allahufayaghfiru liman yashao wayuAAaththibu man yashaowallahu AAala kulli shay-in qadeer

2:285.t: Amana arrasoolu bimaonzila ilayhi min rabbihi walmu/minoona kullun amanabillahi wamala-ikatihi wakutubihiwarusulihi la nufarriqu bayna ahadin min rusulihiwaqaloo samiAAna waataAAna ghufranakarabbana wa-ilayka almaseer

2:286.t: La yukallifu Allahu nafsanilla wusAAaha laha ma kasabatwaAAalayha ma iktasabat rabbana latu-akhithna in naseena aw akhta/narabbana wala tahmil AAalayna isrankama hamaltahu AAala allatheena minqablina rabbana wala tuhammilnama la taqata lana bihi waAAfuAAanna waghfir lana warhamnaanta mawlana fansurna AAalaalqawmi alkafireen

15:9.t: Inna nahnu nazzalna aththikrawa-inna lahu lahafithoon

19:37.t: Fakhtalafa al-ahzabumin baynihim fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo min mashhadiyawmin AAatheem

20:48.t: Inna qad oohiya ilaynaanna alAAathaba AAala man kaththaba watawalla

20:80.t: Ya banee isra-eela qad anjaynakummin AAaduwwikum wawaAAadnakum janiba attoorial-aymana wanazzalna AAalaykumu almanna wassalwa

20:81.t: Kuloo min tayyibati marazaqnakum wala tatghaw feehi fayahillaAAalaykum ghadabee waman yahlil AAalayhi ghadabeefaqad hawa

20:82.t: Wa-innee laghaffarun liman tabawaamana waAAamila salihan thumma ihtada

20:84.t: Qala hum ola-i AAalaatharee waAAajiltu ilayka rabbi litarda

20:85.t: Qala fa-inna qad fatannaqawmaka min baAAdika waadallahumu assamiriy

20:86.t: FarajaAAa moosa ila qawmihighadbana asifan qala ya qawmi alamyaAAidkum rabbukum waAAdan hasanan afatalaAAalaykumu alAAahdu am aradtum an yahilla AAalaykum ghadabunmin rabbikum faakhlaftum mawAAidee

20:87.t: Qaloo ma akhlafnamawAAidaka bimalkina walakinna hummilnaawzaran min zeenati alqawmi faqathafnahafakathalika alqa assamiriy

20:88.t: Faakhraja lahum AAijlan jasadan lahu khuwarunfaqaloo hatha ilahukum wa-ilahu moosafanasiy

20:89.t: Afala yarawna alla yarjiAAuilayhim qawlan wala yamliku lahum darran walanafAAa

20:90.t: Walaqad qala lahum haroonu minqablu ya qawmi innama futintum bihi wa-innarabbakumu arrahmanu fattabiAAooneewaateeAAoo amree

20:91.t: Qaloo lan nabraha AAalayhi AAakifeenahatta yarjiAAa ilayna moosa

20:92.t: Qala ya haroonu mamanaAAaka ith raaytahum dalloo

20:94.t: Qala yabnaomma la ta/khuthbilihyatee wala bira/see innee khasheetu an taqoolafarraqta bayna banee isra-eela walam tarqub qawlee

20:96.t: Qala basurtu bima lamyabsuroo bihi faqabadtu qabdatan min athariarrasooli fanabathtuha wakathalikasawwalat lee nafsee

20:97.t: Qala fathhab fa-innalaka fee alhayati an taqoola la misasawa-inna laka mawAAidan lan tukhlafahu wanthurila ilahika allathee thaltaAAalayhi AAakifan lanuharriqannahu thummalanansifannahu fee alyammi nasfa

20:98.t: Innama ilahukumu Allahuallathee la ilaha illa huwa wasiAAakulla shay-in AAilma

20:99.t: Kathalika naqussu AAalayka minanba-i ma qad sabaqa waqad ataynakamin ladunna thikra

21:1.t: Iqtaraba linnasi hisabuhumwahum fee ghaflatin muAAridoon

21:2.t: Ma ya/teehim min thikrin minrabbihim muhdathin illa istamaAAoohu wahumyalAAaboon

21:3.t: Lahiyatan quloobuhum waasarroo annajwaallatheena thalamoo hal hatha illabasharun mithlukum afata/toona assihra waantum tubsiroon

21:4.t: Qala rabbee yaAAlamu alqawla fee assama-iwal-ardi wahuwa assameeAAu alAAaleem

21:5.t: Bal qaloo adghathu ahlaminbali iftarahu bal huwa shaAAirun falya/tinabi-ayatin kama orsila al-awwaloon

21:6.t: Ma amanat qablahum min qaryatinahlaknaha afahum yu/minoon

21:7.t: Wama arsalna qablaka illarijalan noohee ilayhim fas-aloo ahla aththikriin kuntum la taAAlamoon

21:8.t: Wama jaAAalnahum jasadan laya/kuloona attaAAama wama kanookhalideen

21:9.t: Thumma sadaqnahumu alwaAAdafaanjaynahum waman nashao waahlaknaalmusrifeen

21:10.t: Laqad anzalna ilaykum kitabanfeehi thikrukum afala taAAqiloon

21:11.t: Wakam qasamna min qaryatin kanatthalimatan waansha/na baAAdahaqawman akhareen

21:12.t: Falamma ahassoo ba/sanaitha hum minha yarkudoon

21:13.t: La tarkudoo warjiAAooila ma otriftum feehi wamasakinikumlaAAallakum tus-aloon

21:15.t: Fama zalat tilka daAAwahumhatta jaAAalnahum haseedan khamideen

21:16.t: Wama khalaqna assamaawal-arda wama baynahuma laAAibeen

21:17.t: Law aradna an nattakhithalahwan lattakhathnahu min ladunna inkunna faAAileen

21:18.t: Bal naqthifu bilhaqqiAAala albatili fayadmaghuhu fa-itha huwa zahiqunwalakumu alwaylu mimma tasifoon

21:19.t: Walahu man fee assamawatiwal-ardi waman AAindahu la yastakbiroonaAAan AAibadatihi wala yastahsiroon

21:21.t: Ami ittakhathoo alihatan minaal-ardi hum yunshiroon

21:22.t: Law kana feehima alihatunilla Allahu lafasadata fasubhana Allahirabbi alAAarshi AAamma yasifoon

21:24.t: Ami ittakhathoo min doonihi alihatanqul hatoo burhanakum hatha thikru manmaAAiya wathikru man qablee bal aktharuhum layaAAlamoona alhaqqa fahum muAAridoon

21:25.t: Wama arsalna min qablika minrasoolin illa noohee ilayhi annahu la ilahailla ana faAAbudoon

21:26.t: Waqaloo ittakhatha arrahmanuwaladan subhanahu bal AAibadun mukramoon

21:28.t: YaAAlamu ma bayna aydeehim wamakhalfahum wala yashfaAAoona illa limani irtadawahum min khashyatihi mushfiqoon

21:29.t: Waman yaqul minhum innee ilahun mindoonihi fathalika najzeehi jahannama kathalikanajzee aththalimeen

21:30.t: Awa lam yara allatheenakafaroo anna assamawati wal-ardakanata ratqan fafataqnahuma wajaAAalnamina alma-i kulla shay-in hayyin afalayu/minoon

21:31.t: WajaAAalna fee al-ardi rawasiyaan tameeda bihim wajaAAalna feeha fijajansubulan laAAallahum yahtadoon

21:32.t: WajaAAalna assamaasaqfan mahfoothan wahum AAan ayatihamuAAridoon

21:33.t: Wahuwa allathee khalaqa allayla wannaharawashshamsa walqamara kullun fee falakin yasbahoon

21:34.t: Wama jaAAalna libasharin minqablika alkhulda afa-in mitta fahumu alkhalidoon

21:35.t: Kullu nafsin tha-iqatu almawtiwanablookum bishsharri walkhayri fitnatanwa-ilayna turjaAAoon

21:36.t: Wa-itha raaka allatheenakafaroo in yattakhithoonaka illa huzuwan ahathaallathee yathkuru alihatakum wahum bithikriarrahmani hum kafiroon

21:37.t: Khuliqa al-insanu min AAajalinsaoreekum ayatee fala tastaAAjiloon

21:38.t: Wayaqooloona mata hathaalwaAAdu in kuntum sadiqeen

21:39.t: Law yaAAlamu allatheena kafaroo heenala yakuffoona AAan wujoohihimu annara walaAAan thuhoorihim wala hum yunsaroon

21:40.t: Bal ta/teehim baghtatan fatabhatuhum falayastateeAAoona raddaha wala hum yuntharoon

21:41.t: Walaqadi istuhzi-a birusulin min qablika fahaqabillatheena sakhiroo minhum ma kanoobihi yastahzi-oon

21:42.t: Qul man yaklaokum billayli wannaharimina arrahmani bal hum AAan thikrirabbihim muAAridoon

21:43.t: Am lahum alihatun tamnaAAuhum mindoonina la yastateeAAoona nasraanfusihim wala hum minna yushaboon

21:44.t: Bal mattaAAna haola-iwaabaahum hatta talaAAalayhimu alAAumuru afala yarawna anna na/teeal-arda nanqusuha min atrafihaafahumu alghaliboon

21:45.t: Qul innama onthirukum bilwahyiwala yasmaAAu assummu adduAAaaitha ma yuntharoon

21:46.t: Wala-in massat-hum nafhatun min AAathabirabbika layaqoolunna ya waylana inna kunnathalimeen

21:47.t: WanadaAAu almawazeena alqistaliyawmi alqiyamati fala tuthlamunafsun shay-an wa-in kana mithqala habbatinmin khardalin atayna biha wakafa binahasibeen

21:48.t: Walaqad atayna moosawaharoona alfurqana wadiyaan wathikranlilmuttaqeen

21:49.t: Allatheena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaybiwahum mina assaAAati mushfiqoon

21:50.t: Wahatha thikrun mubarakunanzalnahu afaantum lahu munkiroon

21:51.t: Walaqad atayna ibraheemarushdahu min qablu wakunna bihi AAalimeen

21:52.t: Ith qala li-abeehi waqawmihi mahathihi attamatheelu allatee antum lahaAAakifoon

21:54.t: Qala laqad kuntum antum waabaokumfee dalalin mubeen

21:55.t: Qaloo aji/tana bilhaqqiam anta mina allaAAibeen

21:56.t: Qala bal rabbukum rabbu assamawatiwal-ardi allathee fatarahunna waanaAAala thalikum mina ashshahideen

21:57.t: Watallahi laakeedanna asnamakumbaAAda an tuwalloo mudbireen

21:58.t: FajaAAalahum juthathan illakabeeran lahum laAAallahum ilayhi yarjiAAoon

21:60.t: Qaloo samiAAna fatan yathkuruhumyuqalu lahu ibraheem

21:61.t: Qaloo fa/too bihi AAalaaAAyuni annasi laAAallahum yashhadoon

21:62.t: Qaloo aanta faAAalta hatha bi-alihatinaya ibraheem

21:63.t: Qala bal faAAalahu kabeeruhum hathafas-aloohum in kanoo yantiqoon

21:64.t: FarajaAAoo ila anfusihim faqalooinnakum antumu aththalimoon

21:65.t: Thumma nukisoo AAala ruoosihim laqadAAalimta ma haola-i yantiqoon

21:66.t: Qala afataAAbudoona min dooni Allahima la yanfaAAukum shay-an wala yadurrukum

21:67.t: Offin lakum walima taAAbudoona mindooni Allahi afala taAAqiloon

21:68.t: Qaloo harriqoohu wansurooalihatakum in kuntum faAAileen

21:69.t: Qulna ya naru kooneebardan wasalaman AAala ibraheem

21:71.t: Wanajjaynahu walootan ilaal-ardi allatee barakna feeha lilAAalameen

21:72.t: Wawahabna lahu ishaqawayaAAqooba nafilatan wakullan jaAAalna saliheen

21:73.t: WajaAAalnahum a-immatan yahdoonabi-amrina waawhayna ilayhim fiAAla alkhayratiwa-iqama assalati wa-eetaa azzakatiwakanoo lana AAabideen

21:74.t: Walootan ataynahu hukmanwaAAilman wanajjaynahu mina alqaryati allatee kanattaAAmalu alkhaba-itha innahum kanoo qawma saw-in fasiqeen

21:76.t: Wanoohan ith nadamin qablu fastajabna lahu fanajjaynahuwaahlahu mina alkarbi alAAatheem

21:77.t: Wanasarnahu mina alqawmi allatheenakaththaboo bi-ayatina innahum kanooqawma saw-in faaghraqnahum ajmaAAeen

21:78.t: Wadawooda wasulaymana ithyahkumani fee alharthi ith nafashatfeehi ghanamu alqawmi wakunna lihukmihim shahideen

21:79.t: Fafahhamnaha sulaymanawakullan atayna hukman waAAilman wasakhkharnamaAAa dawooda aljibala yusabbihna wattayrawakunna faAAileen

21:80.t: WaAAallamnahu sanAAatalaboosin lakum lituhsinakum min ba/sikum fahal antum shakiroon

21:81.t: Walisulaymana arreehaAAasifatan tajree bi-amrihi ila al-ardiallatee barakna feeha wakunna bikullishay-in AAalimeen

21:82.t: Wamina ashshayateeni manyaghoosoona lahu wayaAAmaloona AAamalan doona thalikawakunna lahum hafitheen

21:83.t: Waayyooba ith nadarabbahu annee massaniya addurru waanta arhamuarrahimeen

21:84.t: Fastajabna lahu fakashafnama bihi min durrin waataynahu ahlahuwamithlahum maAAahum rahmatan min AAindina wathikralilAAabideen

21:85.t: Wa-ismaAAeela wa-idreesa wathaalkifli kullun mina assabireen

21:87.t: Watha annooni ith thahabamughadiban fathanna an lan naqdira AAalayhifanada fee aththulumatian la ilaha illa anta subhanaka inneekuntu mina aththalimeen

21:88.t: Fastajabna lahu wanajjaynahumina alghammi wakathalika nunjee almu/mineen

21:89.t: Wazakariyya ith nadarabbahu rabbi la tatharnee fardan waanta khayru alwaritheen

21:90.t: Fastajabna lahu wawahabnalahu yahya waaslahna lahuzawjahu innahum kanoo yusariAAoona fee alkhayratiwayadAAoonana raghaban warahaban wakanoo lanakhashiAAeen

21:91.t: Wallatee ahsanat farjahafanafakhna feeha min roohinawajaAAalnaha wabnaha ayatanlilAAalameen

21:92.t: Inna hathihi ommatukum ommatan wahidatanwaana rabbukum faoAAbudoon

21:94.t: Faman yaAAmal mina assalihatiwahuwa mu/minun fala kufrana lisaAAyihi wa-innalahu katiboon

21:95.t: Waharamun AAalaqaryatin ahlaknaha annahum la yarjiAAoon

21:96.t: Hatta itha futihatya/jooju wama/jooju wahum min kulli hadabin yansiloon

21:97.t: Waqtaraba alwaAAdu alhaqqufa-itha hiya shakhisatun absaru allatheenakafaroo ya waylana qad kunna fee ghaflatinmin hatha bal kunna thalimeen

21:98.t: Innakum wama taAAbudoona min dooniAllahi hasabu jahannama antum laha waridoon

21:99.t: Law kana haola-i alihatanma waradooha wakullun feeha khalidoon

21:100.t: Lahum feeha zafeerun wahum feehala yasmaAAoon

21:101.t: Inna allatheena sabaqat lahum minnaalhusna ola-ika AAanha mubAAadoon

21:102.t: La yasmaAAoona haseesahawahum fee ma ishtahat anfusuhum khalidoon

21:103.t: La yahzunuhumu alfazaAAual-akbaru watatalaqqahumu almala-ikatu hathayawmukumu allathee kuntum tooAAadoon

21:104.t: Yawma natwee assamaakatayyi assijlli lilkutubi kama bada/naawwala khalqin nuAAeeduhu waAAdan AAalayna innakunna faAAileen

21:105.t: Walaqad katabna fee azzaboorimin baAAdi aththikri anna al-arda yarithuhaAAibadiya assalihoon

21:108.t: Qul innama yooha ilayya annamailahukum ilahun wahidun fahal antummuslimoon

21:109.t: Fa-in tawallaw faqul athantukum AAalasawa-in wa-in adree aqareebun am baAAeedun matooAAadoon

21:110.t: Innahu yaAAlamu aljahra mina alqawliwayaAAlamu ma taktumoon

21:111.t: Wa-in adree laAAallahu fitnatun lakum wamataAAunila heen

22:1.t: Ya ayyuha annasuittaqoo rabbakum inna zalzalata assaAAati shay-onAAatheem

22:2.t: Yawma tarawnaha tathhalu kullumurdiAAatin AAamma ardaAAat watadaAAukullu thati hamlin hamlaha wataraannasa sukara wama hum bisukarawalakinna AAathaba Allahi shadeed

22:3.t: Wamina annasi man yujadilufee Allahi bighayri AAilmin wayattabiAAu kulla shaytaninmareed

22:4.t: Kutiba AAalayhi annahu man tawallahufaannahu yudilluhu wayahdeehi ila AAathabi assaAAeer

22:5.t: Ya ayyuha annasuin kuntum fee raybin mina albaAAthi fa-inna khalaqnakummin turabin thumma min nutfatin thumma minAAalaqatin thumma min mudghatin mukhallaqatin waghayrimukhallaqatin linubayyina lakum wanuqirru fee al-arhami manashao ila ajalin musamman thumma nukhrijukum tiflanthumma litablughoo ashuddakum waminkum man yutawaffawaminkum man yuraddu ila arthali alAAumuri likaylayaAAlama min baAAdi AAilmin shay-an watara al-ardahamidatan fa-itha anzalna AAalayhaalmaa ihtazzat warabat waanbatat min kulli zawjin baheej

22:6.t: Thalika bi-anna Allaha huwa alhaqquwaannahu yuhyee almawta waannahu AAala kullishay-in qadeer

22:7.t: Waanna assaAAata atiyatunla rayba feeha waanna Allaha yabAAathu manfee alquboor

22:8.t: Wamina annasi man yujadilufee Allahi bighayri AAilmin wala hudan walakitabin muneer

22:9.t: Thaniya AAitfihi liyudillaAAan sabeeli Allahi lahu fee addunyakhizyun wanutheequhu yawma alqiyamati AAathabaalhareeq

22:10.t: Thalika bima qaddamat yadakawaanna Allaha laysa bithallaminlilAAabeed

22:11.t: Wamina annasi man yaAAbuduAllaha AAala harfin fa-in asabahukhayrun itmaanna bihi wa-in asabat-hu fitnatuninqalaba AAala wajhihi khasira addunya wal-akhiratathalika huwa alkhusranu almubeen

22:12.t: YadAAoo min dooni Allahi ma layadurruhu wama la yanfaAAuhu thalikahuwa addalalu albaAAeed

22:13.t: YadAAoo laman darruhu aqrabu minnafAAihi labi/sa almawla walabi/sa alAAasheer

22:14.t: Inna Allaha yudkhilu allatheenaamanoo waAAamiloo assalihati jannatintajree min tahtiha al-anharu inna AllahayafAAalu ma yureed

22:15.t: Man kana yathunnu anlan yansurahu Allahu fee addunya wal-akhiratifalyamdud bisababin ila assama-i thummaliyaqtaAA falyanthur hal yuthhibannakayduhu ma yagheeth

22:16.t: Wakathalika anzalnahu ayatinbayyinatin waanna Allaha yahdee man yureed

22:17.t: Inna allatheena amanoo wallatheenahadoo wassabi-eena wannasarawalmajoosa wallatheena ashrakoo inna Allahayafsilu baynahum yawma alqiyamati inna AllahaAAala kulli shay-in shaheed

22:18.t: Alam tara anna Allaha yasjudu lahuman fee assamawati waman fee al-ardiwashshamsu walqamaru wannujoomu waljibaluwashshajaru waddawabbu wakatheerun minaannasi wakatheerun haqqa AAalayhi alAAathabuwaman yuhini Allahu fama lahu min mukrimin inna AllahayafAAalu ma yasha/

22:19.t: Hathani khasmani ikhtasamoofee rabbihim fallatheena kafaroo quttiAAatlahum thiyabun min narin yusabbu min fawqiruoosihimu alhameem

22:22.t: Kullama aradoo an yakhrujoominha min ghammin oAAeedoo feeha wathooqooAAathaba alhareeq

22:23.t: Inna Allaha yudkhilu allatheenaamanoo waAAamiloo assalihati jannatintajree min tahtiha al-anharu yuhallawnafeeha min asawira min thahabin walu/lu-anwalibasuhum feeha hareer

22:24.t: Wahudoo ila attayyibimina alqawli wahudoo ila sirati alhameed

22:25.t: Inna allatheena kafaroo wayasuddoonaAAan sabeeli Allahi walmasjidi alharamiallathee jaAAalnahu linnasi sawaanalAAakifu feehi walbadi waman yurid feehibi-ilhadin bithulmin nuthiqhu min AAathabinaleem

22:26.t: Wa-ith bawwa/na li-ibraheemamakana albayti an la tushrik bee shay-an watahhirbaytiya litta-ifeena walqa-imeenawarrukkaAAi assujood

22:27.t: Waaththin fee annasibilhajji ya/tooka rijalan waAAalakulli damirin ya/teena min kulli fajjin AAameeq

22:28.t: Liyashhadoo manafiAAa lahum wayathkurooisma Allahi fee ayyamin maAAloomatin AAalama razaqahum min baheemati al-anAAami fakuloo minhawaatAAimoo alba-isa alfaqeer

22:29.t: Thumma lyaqdoo tafathahum walyoofoonuthoorahum walyattawwafoo bilbaytialAAateeq

22:30.t: Thalika waman yuAAaththimhurumati Allahi fahuwa khayrun lahu AAindarabbihi waohillat lakumu al-anAAamu illa mayutla AAalaykum fajtaniboo arrijsa minaal-awthani wajtaniboo qawla azzoor

22:31.t: Hunafaa lillahi ghayramushrikeena bihi waman yushrik billahi fakaannamakharra mina assama-i fatakhtafuhu attayruaw tahwee bihi arreehu fee makanin saheeq

22:32.t: Thalika waman yuAAaththimshaAAa-ira Allahi fa-innaha min taqwaalquloob

22:33.t: Lakum feeha manafiAAu ilaajalin musamman thumma mahilluha ila albaytialAAateeq

22:34.t: Walikulli ommatin jaAAalna mansakanliyathkuroo isma Allahi AAala marazaqahum min baheemati al-anAAami fa-ilahukum ilahunwahidun falahu aslimoo wabashshiri almukhbiteen

22:35.t: Allatheena itha thukiraAllahu wajilat quloobuhum wassabireenaAAala ma asabahum walmuqeemee assalatiwamimma razaqnahum yunfiqoon

22:36.t: Walbudna jaAAalnahalakum min shaAAa-iri Allahi lakum feehakhayrun fathkuroo isma Allahi AAalayhasawaffa fa-itha wajabat junoobuhafakuloo minha waatAAimoo alqaniAAa walmuAAtarrakathalika sakhkharnaha lakum laAAallakumtashkuroon

22:37.t: Lan yanala Allaha luhoomuhawala dimaoha walakin yanaluhuattaqwa minkum kathalika sakhkharahalakum litukabbiroo Allaha AAala ma hadakumwabashshiri almuhsineen

22:38.t: Inna Allaha yudafiAAu AAaniallatheena amanoo inna Allaha la yuhibbukulla khawwanin kafoor

22:39.t: Othina lillatheena yuqataloonabi-annahum thulimoo wa-inna Allaha AAalanasrihim laqadeer

22:40.t: Allatheena okhrijoo min diyarihimbighayri haqqin illa an yaqooloo rabbuna Allahuwalawla dafAAu Allahi annasa baAAdahumbibaAAdin lahuddimat sawamiAAu wabiyaAAun wasalawatunwamasajidu yuthkaru feeha ismu Allahikatheeran walayansuranna Allahu man yansuruhuinna Allaha laqawiyyun AAazeez

22:41.t: Allatheena in makkannahum feeal-ardi aqamoo assalata waatawooazzakata waamaroo bilmaAAroofi wanahawAAani almunkari walillahi AAaqibatu al-omoor

22:42.t: Wa-in yukaththibooka faqad kaththabatqablahum qawmu noohin waAAadun wathamood

22:44.t: Waas-habu madyana wakuththibamoosa faamlaytu lilkafireena thumma akhathtuhumfakayfa kana nakeer

22:45.t: Fakaayyin min qaryatin ahlaknahawahiya thalimatun fahiya khawiyatunAAala AAurooshiha wabi/rin muAAattalatinwaqasrin masheed

22:46.t: Afalam yaseeroo fee al-ardi fatakoonalahum quloobun yaAAqiloona biha aw athanunyasmaAAoona biha fa-innaha la taAAmaal-absaru walakin taAAma alquloobu allateefee assudoor

22:47.t: WayastaAAjiloonaka bilAAathabiwalan yukhlifa Allahu waAAdahu wa-inna yawman AAindarabbika kaalfi sanatin mimma taAAuddoon

22:48.t: Wakaayyin min qaryatin amlaytu lahawahiya thalimatun thumma akhathtuhawa-ilayya almaseer

22:49.t: Qul ya ayyuha annasuinnama ana lakum natheerun mubeen

22:50.t: Fallatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati lahum maghfiratunwarizqun kareem

22:51.t: Wallatheena saAAaw fee ayatinamuAAajizeena ola-ika as-habu aljaheem

22:52.t: Wama arsalna min qablika minrasoolin wala nabiyyin illa itha tamannaalqa ashshaytanu fee omniyyatihi fayansakhuAllahu ma yulqee ashshaytanu thummayuhkimu Allahu ayatihi wallahuAAaleemun hakeem

22:53.t: LiyajAAala ma yulqee ashshaytanufitnatan lillatheena fee quloobihim maradun walqasiyatiquloobuhum wa-inna aththalimeenalafee shiqaqin baAAeed

22:54.t: WaliyaAAlama allatheena ootooalAAilma annahu alhaqqu min rabbika fayu/minoo bihifatukhbita lahu quloobuhum wa-inna Allaha lahadiallatheena amanoo ila siratinmustaqeem

22:55.t: Wala yazalu allatheenakafaroo fee miryatin minhu hatta ta/tiyahumu assaAAatubaghtatan aw ya/tiyahum AAathabu yawmin AAaqeem

22:56.t: Almulku yawma-ithin lillahi yahkumubaynahum fallatheena amanoo waAAamiloo assalihatifee jannati annaAAeem

22:57.t: Wallatheena kafaroo wakaththaboobi-ayatina faola-ika lahum AAathabunmuheen

22:58.t: Wallatheena hajaroofee sabeeli Allahi thumma qutiloo aw matoolayarzuqannahumu Allahu rizqan hasanan wa-inna Allahalahuwa khayru arraziqeen

22:59.t: Layudkhilannahum mudkhalan yardawnahuwa-inna Allaha laAAaleemun haleem

22:60.t: Thalika waman AAaqaba bimithlima AAooqiba bihi thumma bughiya AAalayhi layansurannahuAllahu inna Allaha laAAafuwwun ghafoor

22:61.t: Thalika bi-anna Allaha yoolijuallayla fee annahari wayooliju annaharafee allayli waanna Allaha sameeAAun baseer

22:62.t: Thalika bi-anna Allaha huwa alhaqquwaanna ma yadAAoona min doonihi huwa albatiluwaanna Allaha huwa alAAaliyyu alkabeer

22:63.t: Alam tara anna Allaha anzala mina assama-imaan fatusbihu al-ardu mukhdarrataninna Allaha lateefun khabeer

22:64.t: Lahu ma fee assamawatiwama fee al-ardi wa-inna Allaha lahuwaalghaniyyu alhameed

22:65.t: Alam tara anna Allaha sakhkhara lakumma fee al-ardi walfulka tajree fee albahribi-amrihi wayumsiku assamaa an taqaAAa AAalaal-ardi illa bi-ithnihi inna Allahabinnasi laraoofun raheem

22:66.t: Wahuwa allathee ahyakumthumma yumeetukum thumma yuhyeekum inna al-insanalakafoor

22:67.t: Likulli ommatin jaAAalna mansakan humnasikoohu fala yunaziAAunnaka fee al-amri wadAAuila rabbika innaka laAAala hudan mustaqeem

22:68.t: Wa-in jadalooka faquli AllahuaAAlamu bima taAAmaloon

22:69.t: Allahu yahkumu baynakum yawmaalqiyamati feema kuntum feehi takhtalifoon

22:70.t: Alam taAAlam anna Allaha yaAAlamu mafee assama-i wal-ardi inna thalikafee kitabin inna thalika AAala Allahiyaseer

22:71.t: WayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi malam yunazzil bihi sultanan wama laysa lahum bihiAAilmun wama liththalimeenamin naseer

22:72.t: Wa-itha tutla AAalayhim ayatunabayyinatin taAArifu fee wujoohi allatheena kafarooalmunkara yakadoona yastoona billatheenayatloona AAalayhim ayatina qulafaonabbi-okum bisharrin min thalikum annaruwaAAadaha Allahu allatheena kafaroo wabi/saalmaseer

22:73.t: Ya ayyuha annasuduriba mathalun fastamiAAoo lahu inna allatheenatadAAoona min dooni Allahi lan yakhluqoo thubabanwalawi ijtamaAAoo lahu wa-in yaslubuhumu aththubabushay-an la yastanqithoohu minhu daAAufa attalibuwalmatloob

22:74.t: Ma qadaroo Allaha haqqaqadrihi inna Allaha laqawiyyun AAazeez

22:75.t: Allahu yastafee mina almala-ikatirusulan wamina annasi inna Allaha sameeAAunbaseer

22:76.t: YaAAlamu ma bayna aydeehim wamakhalfahum wa-ila Allahi turjaAAu al-omoor

22:77.t: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanooirkaAAoo wasjudoo waAAbudoo rabbakum wafAAalooalkhayra laAAallakum tuflihoon

22:78.t: Wajahidoo fee Allahi haqqajihadihi huwa ijtabakum wama jaAAalaAAalaykum fee addeeni min harajin millata abeekumibraheema huwa sammakumu almuslimeena min qabluwafee hatha liyakoona arrasoolu shaheedanAAalaykum watakoonoo shuhadaa AAala annasifaaqeemoo assalata waatoo azzakatawaAAtasimoo billahi huwa mawlakumfaniAAma almawla waniAAma annaseer

23:6.t: Illa AAala azwajihim awma malakat aymanuhum fa-innahum ghayru maloomeen

23:7.t: Famani ibtagha waraa thalikafaola-ika humu alAAadoon

23:12.t: Walaqad khalaqna al-insana minsulalatin min teen

23:14.t: Thumma khalaqna annutfataAAalaqatan fakhalaqna alAAalaqata mudghatanfakhalaqna almudghata AAithamanfakasawna alAAithama lahmanthumma ansha/nahu khalqan akhara fatabarakaAllahu ahsanu alkhaliqeen

23:17.t: Walaqad khalaqna fawqakum sabAAa tara-iqawama kunna AAani alkhalqi ghafileen

23:18.t: Waanzalna mina assama-imaan biqadarin faaskannahu fee al-ardiwa-inna AAala thahabin bihi laqadiroon

23:19.t: Faansha/na lakum bihi jannatinmin nakheelin waaAAnabin lakum feeha fawakihukatheeratun waminha ta/kuloon

23:20.t: Washajaratan takhruju min toori saynaatanbutu bidduhni wasibghin lilakileen

23:21.t: Wa-inna lakum fee al-anAAamilaAAibratan nusqeekum mimma fee butoonihawalakum feeha manafiAAu katheeratun waminhata/kuloon

23:23.t: Walaqad arsalna noohan ilaqawmihi faqala ya qawmi oAAbudoo Allaha malakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaqoon

23:24.t: Faqala almalao allatheenakafaroo min qawmihi ma hatha illa basharunmithlukum yureedu an yatafaddala AAalaykum walaw shaaAllahu laanzala mala-ikatan ma samiAAnabihatha fee aba-ina al-awwaleen

23:25.t: In huwa illa rajulun bihi jinnatunfatarabbasoo bihi hatta heen

23:27.t: Faawhayna ilayhi ani isnaAAialfulka bi-aAAyunina wawahyina fa-ithajaa amruna wafara attannooru faslukfeeha min kullin zawjayni ithnayni waahlaka illaman sabaqa AAalayhi alqawlu minhum wala tukhatibneefee allatheena thalamoo innahum mughraqoon

23:28.t: Fa-itha istawayta anta waman maAAakaAAala alfulki faquli alhamdu lillahi allatheenajjana mina alqawmi aththalimeen

23:29.t: Waqul rabbi anzilnee munzalan mubarakanwaanta khayru almunzileen

23:30.t: Inna fee thalika laayatinwa-in kunna lamubtaleen

23:31.t: Thumma ansha/na min baAAdihim qarnan akhareen

23:32.t: Faarsalna feehim rasoolan minhum anioAAbudoo Allaha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhuafala tattaqoon

23:33.t: Waqala almalao min qawmihi allatheenakafaroo wakaththaboo biliqa-i al-akhiratiwaatrafnahum fee alhayati addunyama hatha illa basharun mithlukum ya/kulumimma ta/kuloona minhu wayashrabu mimma tashraboon

23:34.t: Wala-in ataAAtum basharan mithlakuminnakum ithan lakhasiroon

23:35.t: AyaAAidukum annakum itha mittumwakuntum turaban waAAithaman annakummukhrajoon

23:37.t: In hiya illa hayatunaaddunya namootu wanahya wamanahnu bimabAAootheen

23:38.t: In huwa illa rajulun iftaraAAala Allahi kathiban wama nahnulahu bimu/mineen

23:41.t: Faakhathat-humu assayhatubilhaqqi fajaAAalnahum ghuthaanfabuAAdan lilqawmi aththalimeen

23:43.t: Ma tasbiqu min ommatin ajalahawama yasta/khiroon

23:44.t: Thumma arsalna rusulana tatrakulla ma jaa ommatan rasooluha kaththaboohufaatbaAAna baAAdahum baAAdan wajaAAalnahumahadeetha fabuAAdan liqawmin la yu/minoon

23:45.t: Thumma arsalna moosa waakhahuharoona bi-ayatina wasultaninmubeen

23:46.t: Ila firAAawna wamala-ihi fastakbaroowakanoo qawman AAaleen

23:47.t: Faqaloo anu/minu libasharayni mithlinawaqawmuhuma lana AAabidoon

23:50.t: WajaAAalna ibna maryama waommahu ayatanwaawaynahuma ila rabwatin thatiqararin wamaAAeen

23:51.t: Ya ayyuha arrusulukuloo mina attayyibati waAAmaloo salihaninnee bima taAAmaloona AAaleem

23:52.t: Wa-inna hathihi ommatukum ommatan wahidatanwaana rabbukum fattaqoon

23:53.t: FataqattaAAoo amrahum baynahumzuburan kullu hizbin bima ladayhim farihoon

23:55.t: Ayahsaboona annama numidduhumbihi min malin wabaneen

23:56.t: NusariAAu lahum fee alkhayratibal la yashAAuroon

23:57.t: Inna allatheena hum min khashyatirabbihim mushfiqoon

23:60.t: Wallatheena yu/toona maataw waquloobuhum wajilatun annahum ila rabbihim rajiAAoon

23:61.t: Ola-ika yusariAAoona feealkhayrati wahum laha sabiqoon

23:62.t: Wala nukallifu nafsan illawusAAaha waladayna kitabun yantiqu bilhaqqiwahum la yuthlamoon

23:63.t: Bal quloobuhum fee ghamratin min hathawalahum aAAmalun min dooni thalika hum lahaAAamiloon

23:64.t: Hatta itha akhathnamutrafeehim bilAAathabi itha hum yaj-aroon

23:65.t: La taj-aroo alyawma innakum minnala tunsaroon

23:66.t: Qad kanat ayatee tutlaAAalaykum fakuntum AAala aAAqabikum tankisoon

23:68.t: Afalam yaddabbaroo alqawla am jaahumma lam ya/ti abaahumu al-awwaleen

23:69.t: Am lam yaAArifoo rasoolahum fahum lahumunkiroon

23:70.t: Am yaqooloona bihi jinnatun bal jaahumbilhaqqi waaktharuhum lilhaqqi karihoon

23:71.t: Walawi ittabaAAa alhaqqu ahwaahumlafasadati assamawatu wal-arduwaman feehinna bal ataynahum bithikrihim fahum AAanthikrihim muAAridoon

23:72.t: Am tas-aluhum kharjan fakharajurabbika khayrun wahuwa khayru arraziqeen

23:74.t: Wa-inna allatheena layu/minoona bil-akhirati AAani assiratilanakiboon

23:75.t: Walaw rahimnahum wakashafnama bihim min durrin lalajjoo fee tughyanihimyaAAmahoon

23:76.t: Walaqad akhathnahum bilAAathabifama istakanoo lirabbihim wama yatadarraAAoon

23:77.t: Hatta itha fatahnaAAalayhim baban tha AAathabin shadeedin ithahum feehi mublisoon

23:78.t: Wahuwa allathee anshaa lakumu assamAAawal-absara wal-af-idata qaleelan matashkuroon

23:79.t: Wahuwa allathee tharaakum feeal-ardi wa-ilayhi tuhsharoon

23:80.t: Wahuwa allathee yuhyeewayumeetu walahu ikhtilafu allayli wannahariafala taAAqiloon

23:82.t: Qaloo a-itha mitnawakunna turaban waAAithamana-inna lamabAAoothoon

23:83.t: Laqad wuAAidna nahnu waabaonahatha min qablu in hatha illa asateerual-awwaleen

23:84.t: Qul limani al-ardu waman feehain kuntum taAAlamoon

23:86.t: Qul man rabbu assamawatiassabAAi warabbu alAAarshi alAAatheem

23:88.t: Qul man biyadihi malakootu kulli shay-inwahuwa yujeeru wala yujaru AAalayhi in kuntumtaAAlamoon

23:91.t: Ma ittakhatha Allahumin waladin wama kana maAAahu min ilahin ithanlathahaba kullu ilahin bima khalaqa walaAAalabaAAduhum AAala baAAdin subhana AllahiAAamma yasifoon

23:94.t: Rabbi fala tajAAalnee fee alqawmi aththalimeen

23:95.t: Wa-inna AAala an nuriyaka manaAAiduhum laqadiroon

23:96.t: IdfaAA billatee hiya ahsanu assayyi-atanahnu aAAlamu bima yasifoon

23:97.t: Waqul rabbi aAAoothu bika min hamazatiashshayateen

23:99.t: Hatta itha jaa ahadahumualmawtu qala rabbi irjiAAoon

23:100.t: LaAAallee aAAmalu salihanfeema taraktu kalla innaha kalimatun huwa qa-iluhawamin wara-ihim barzakhun ila yawmi yubAAathoon

23:101.t: Fa-itha nufikha fee assoorifala ansaba baynahum yawma-ithin walayatasaaloon

23:103.t: Waman khaffat mawazeenuhu faola-ikaallatheena khasiroo anfusahum fee jahannama khalidoon

23:105.t: Alam takun ayatee tutlaAAalaykum fakuntum biha tukaththiboon

23:106.t: Qaloo rabbana ghalabatAAalayna shiqwatuna wakunna qawman dalleen

23:107.t: Rabbana akhrijna minhafa-in AAudna fa-inna thalimoon

23:109.t: Innahu kana fareequn min AAibadeeyaqooloona rabbana amanna faghfirlana warhamna waanta khayru arrahimeen

23:110.t: Fattakhathtumoohumsikhriyyan hatta ansawkum thikree wakuntumminhum tadhakoon

23:111.t: Innee jazaytuhumu alyawma bima sabarooannahum humu alfa-izoon

23:112.t: Qala kam labithtum fee al-ardiAAadada sineen

23:113.t: Qaloo labithna yawman aw baAAdayawmin fas-ali alAAaddeen

23:114.t: Qala in labithtum illaqaleelan law annakum kuntum taAAlamoon

23:115.t: Afahasibtum annama khalaqnakumAAabathan waannakum ilayna la turjaAAoon

23:116.t: FataAAala Allahualmaliku alhaqqu la ilaha illa huwarabbu alAAarshi alkareem

23:117.t: Waman yadAAu maAAa Allahi ilahanakhara la burhana lahu bihi fa-innamahisabuhu AAinda rabbihi innahu la yuflihualkafiroon

23:118.t: Waqul rabbi ighfir warhamwaanta khayru arrahimeen

24:1.t: Sooratun anzalnaha wafaradnahawaanzalna feeha ayatin bayyinatinlaAAallakum tathakkaroon

24:2.t: Azzaniyatu wazzaneefajlidoo kulla wahidin minhuma mi-atajaldatin wala ta/khuthkum bihima ra/fatunfee deeni Allahi in kuntum tu/minoona billahiwalyawmi al-akhiri walyashhad AAathabahumata-ifatun mina almu/mineen

24:3.t: Azzanee la yankihuilla zaniyatan aw mushrikatan wazzaniyatula yankihuha illa zanin awmushrikun wahurrima thalika AAalaalmu/mineen

24:4.t: Wallatheena yarmoona almuhsanatithumma lam ya/too bi-arbaAAati shuhadaa fajlidoohumthamaneena jaldatan wala taqbaloo lahum shahadatanabadan waola-ika humu alfasiqoon

24:5.t: Illa allatheena taboomin baAAdi thalika waaslahoo fa-inna Allahaghafoorun raheem

24:6.t: Wallatheena yarmoona azwajahumwalam yakun lahum shuhadao illa anfusuhum fashahadatuahadihim arbaAAu shahadatin billahiinnahu lamina assadiqeen

24:7.t: Walkhamisatu anna laAAnata AllahiAAalayhi in kana mina alkathibeen

24:8.t: Wayadrao AAanha alAAathaba antashhada arbaAAa shahadatin billahiinnahu lamina alkathibeen

24:9.t: Walkhamisata anna ghadabaAllahi AAalayha in kana mina assadiqeen

24:10.t: Walawla fadlu AllahiAAalaykum warahmatuhu waanna Allaha tawwabunhakeem

24:11.t: Inna allatheena jaoo bil-ifkiAAusbatun minkum la tahsaboohu sharran lakumbal huwa khayrun lakum likulli imri-in minhum ma iktasabamina al-ithmi wallathee tawalla kibrahuminhum lahu AAathabun AAatheem

24:12.t: Lawla ith samiAAtumoohu thannaalmu/minoona walmu/minatu bi-anfusihim khayran waqaloohatha ifkun mubeen

24:13.t: Lawla jaoo AAalayhibi-arbaAAati shuhadaa fa-ith lam ya/too bishshuhada-ifaola-ika AAinda Allahi humu alkathiboon

24:14.t: Walawla fadlu AllahiAAalaykum warahmatuhu fee addunya wal-akhiratilamassakum fee ma afadtum feehi AAathabunAAatheem

24:15.t: Ith talaqqawnahu bi-alsinatikumwataqooloona bi-afwahikum ma laysa lakum bihiAAilmun watahsaboonahu hayyinan wahuwa AAinda AllahiAAatheem

24:16.t: Walawla ith samiAAtumoohuqultum ma yakoonu lana an natakallama bihathasubhanaka hatha buhtanun AAatheem

24:17.t: YaAAithukumu Allahu antaAAoodoo limithlihi abadan in kuntum mu/mineen

24:18.t: Wayubayyinu Allahu lakumu al-ayatiwallahu AAaleemun hakeem

24:19.t: Inna allatheena yuhibboona antasheeAAa alfahishatu fee allatheena amanoolahum AAathabun aleemun fee addunya wal-akhiratiwallahu yaAAlamu waantum la taAAlamoon

24:20.t: Walawla fadlu AllahiAAalaykum warahmatuhu waanna Allaha raoofun raheem

24:21.t: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoola tattabiAAoo khutuwati ashshaytaniwaman yattabiAA khutuwati ashshaytanifa-innahu ya/muru bilfahsha-i walmunkariwalawla fadlu Allahi AAalaykum warahmatuhuma zaka minkum min ahadin abadan walakinnaAllaha yuzakkee man yashao wallahusameeAAun AAaleem

24:22.t: Wala ya/tali oloo alfadliminkum wassaAAati an yu/too olee alqurba walmasakeenawalmuhajireena fee sabeeli AllahiwalyaAAfoo walyasfahoo ala tuhibboonaan yaghfira Allahu lakum wallahu ghafoorunraheem

24:23.t: Inna allatheena yarmoona almuhsanatialghafilati almu/minati luAAinoo fee addunyawal-akhirati walahum AAathabun AAatheem

24:24.t: Yawma tashhadu AAalayhim alsinatuhumwaaydeehim waarjuluhum bima kanoo yaAAmaloon

24:25.t: Yawma-ithin yuwaffeehimu Allahudeenahumu alhaqqa wayaAAlamoona anna Allaha huwa alhaqqualmubeen

24:26.t: Alkhabeethatu lilkhabeetheena walkhabeethoonalilkhabeethati wattayyibatu littayyibeenawattayyiboona littayyibatiola-ika mubarraoona mimma yaqooloona lahummaghfiratun warizqun kareem

24:27.t: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanoola tadkhuloo buyootan ghayra buyootikum hattatasta/nisoo watusallimoo AAala ahliha thalikumkhayrun lakum laAAallakum tathakkaroon

24:28.t: Fa-in lam tajidoo feeha ahadanfala tadkhulooha hatta yu/thanalakum wa-in qeela lakumu irjiAAoo farjiAAoo huwa azkalakum wallahu bima taAAmaloona AAaleem

24:29.t: Laysa AAalaykum junahun an tadkhuloobuyootan ghayra maskoonatin feeha mataAAun lakum wallahuyaAAlamu ma tubdoona wama taktumoon

24:30.t: Qul lilmu/mineena yaghuddoo min absarihumwayahfathoo furoojahum thalika azkalahum inna Allaha khabeerun bima yasnaAAoon

24:31.t: Waqul lilmu/minati yaghdudnamin absarihinna wayahfathnafuroojahunna wala yubdeena zeenatahunna illa mathahara minha walyadribnabikhumurihinna AAala juyoobihinna wala yubdeenazeenatahunna illa libuAAoolatihinna aw aba-ihinnaaw aba-i buAAoolatihinna aw abna-ihinna awabna-i buAAoolatihinna aw ikhwanihinna aw baneeikhwanihinna aw banee akhawatihinna aw nisa-ihinnaaw ma malakat aymanuhunna awi attabiAAeenaghayri olee al-irbati mina arrijali awi attifliallatheena lam yathharoo AAala AAawratiannisa-i wala yadribnabi-arjulihinna liyuAAlama ma yukhfeena min zeenatihinnawatooboo ila Allahi jameeAAan ayyuhaalmu/minoona laAAallakum tuflihoon

24:32.t: Waankihoo al-ayamaminkum wassaliheena min AAibadikumwa-ima-ikum in yakoonoo fuqaraa yughnihimu Allahumin fadlihi wallahu wasiAAun AAaleem

24:33.t: WalyastaAAfifi allatheena layajidoona nikahan hatta yughniyahumu Allahumin fadlihi wallatheena yabtaghoona alkitabamimma malakat aymanukum fakatiboohum inAAalimtum feehim khayran waatoohum min mali Allahiallathee atakum wala tukrihoo fatayatikumAAala albigha-i in aradna tahassunanlitabtaghoo AAarada alhayati addunyawaman yukrihhunna fa-inna Allaha min baAAdi ikrahihinnaghafoorun raheem

24:34.t: Walaqad anzalna ilaykum ayatinmubayyinatin wamathalan mina allatheena khalaw minqablikum wamawAAithatan lilmuttaqeen

24:35.t: Allahu nooru assamawatiwal-ardi mathalu noorihi kamishkatin feehamisbahun almisbahu fee zujajatinazzujajatu kaannaha kawkabun durriyyunyooqadu min shajaratin mubarakatin zaytoonatin lasharqiyyatin wala gharbiyyatin yakadu zaytuhayudee-o walaw lam tamsas-hu narun noorun AAalanoorin yahdee Allahu linoorihi man yashao wayadribuAllahu al-amthala linnasi wallahubikulli shay-in AAaleem

24:36.t: Fee buyootin athina Allahu anturfaAAa wayuthkara feeha ismuhu yusabbihulahu feeha bilghuduwwi wal-asal

24:37.t: Rijalun la tulheehim tijaratunwala bayAAun AAan thikri Allahi wa-iqamiassalati wa-eeta-i azzakatiyakhafoona yawman tataqallabu feehi alquloobu wal-absar

24:38.t: Liyajziyahumu Allahu ahsana maAAamiloo wayazeedahum min fadlihi wallahuyarzuqu man yashao bighayri hisab

24:39.t: Wallatheena kafaroo aAAmaluhumkasarabin biqeeAAatin yahsabuhu aththam-anumaan hatta itha jaahu lamyajidhu shay-an wawajada Allaha AAindahu fawaffahu hisabahuwallahu sareeAAu alhisab

24:40.t: Aw kathulumatin fee bahrinlujjiyyin yaghshahu mawjun min fawqihi mawjun min fawqihisahabun thulumatun baAAduhafawqa baAAdin itha akhraja yadahu lam yakad yarahawaman lam yajAAali Allahu lahu nooran fama lahu minnoor

24:41.t: Alam tara anna Allaha yusabbihulahu man fee assamawati wal-ardiwattayru saffatin kullun qadAAalima salatahu watasbeehahu wallahuAAaleemun bima yafAAaloon

24:42.t: Walillahi mulku assamawatiwal-ardi wa-ila Allahi almaseer

24:43.t: Alam tara anna Allaha yuzjee sahabanthumma yu-allifu baynahu thumma yajAAaluhu rukaman fataraalwadqa yakhruju min khilalihi wayunazzilu mina assama-imin jibalin feeha min baradin fayuseebu bihiman yashao wayasrifuhu AAan man yashao yakadusana barqihi yathhabu bil-absar

24:44.t: Yuqallibu Allahu allayla wannaharainna fee thalika laAAibratan li-olee al-absar

24:45.t: Wallahu khalaqa kulla dabbatinmin ma-in faminhum man yamshee AAala batnihiwaminhum man yamshee AAala rijlayni waminhum man yamsheeAAala arbaAAin yakhluqu Allahu ma yashaoinna Allaha AAala kulli shay-in qadeer

24:46.t: Laqad anzalna ayatinmubayyinatin wallahu yahdee man yashaoila siratin mustaqeem

24:47.t: Wayaqooloona amanna billahiwabirrasooli waataAAna thumma yatawallafareequn minhum min baAAdi thalika wama ola-ikabilmu/mineen

24:48.t: Wa-itha duAAoo ila Allahiwarasoolihi liyahkuma baynahum itha fareequn minhummuAAridoon

24:49.t: Wa-in yakun lahumu alhaqqu ya/tooilayhi muthAAineen

24:50.t: Afee quloobihim maradun ami irtabooam yakhafoona an yaheefa Allahu AAalayhimwarasooluhu bal ola-ika humu aththalimoon

24:51.t: Innama kana qawla almu/mineenaitha duAAoo ila Allahi warasoolihi liyahkumabaynahum an yaqooloo samiAAna waataAAna waola-ikahumu almuflihoon

24:52.t: Waman yutiAAi Allahawarasoolahu wayakhsha Allaha wayattaqhi faola-ikahumu alfa-izoon

24:53.t: Waaqsamoo billahi jahda aymanihimla-in amartahum layakhrujunna qul la tuqsimoo taAAatunmaAAroofatun inna Allaha khabeerun bima taAAmaloon

24:54.t: Qul ateeAAoo Allaha waateeAAooarrasoola fa-in tawallaw fa-innama AAalayhi mahummila waAAalaykum ma hummiltum wa-in tuteeAAoohutahtadoo wama AAala arrasooli illaalbalaghu almubeen

24:55.t: WaAAada Allahu allatheena amanoominkum waAAamiloo assalihatilayastakhlifannahum fee al-ardi kama istakhlafaallatheena min qablihim walayumakkinanna lahum deenahumuallathee irtada lahum walayubaddilannahum minbaAAdi khawfihim amnan yaAAbudoonanee la yushrikoona beeshay-an waman kafara baAAda thalika faola-ika humualfasiqoon

24:56.t: Waaqeemoo assalata waatooazzakata waateeAAoo arrasoolalaAAallakum turhamoon

24:57.t: La tahsabanna allatheenakafaroo muAAjizeena fee al-ardi wama/wahumu annaruwalabi/sa almaseer

24:58.t: Ya ayyuha allatheena amanooliyasta/thinkumu allatheena malakat aymanukumwallatheena lam yablughoo alhuluma minkumthalatha marratin min qabli salatialfajri waheena tadaAAoona thiyabakum mina aththaheeratiwamin baAAdi salati alAAisha-i thalathuAAawratin lakum laysa AAalaykum wala AAalayhim junahunbaAAdahunna tawwafoona AAalaykum baAAdukumAAala baAAdin kathalika yubayyinu Allahulakumu al-ayati wallahu AAaleemun hakeem

24:59.t: Wa-itha balagha al-atfaluminkumu alhuluma falyasta/thinoo kama ista/thanaallatheena min qablihim kathalika yubayyinu Allahulakum ayatihi wallahu AAaleemun hakeem

24:60.t: WalqawaAAidu mina annisa-iallatee la yarjoona nikahan falaysaAAalayhinna junahun an yadaAAna thiyabahunnaghayra mutabarrijatin bizeenatin waan yastaAAfifna khayrunlahunna wallahu sameeAAun AAaleem

24:61.t: Laysa AAala al-aAAma harajunwala AAala al-aAAraji harajun walaAAala almareedi harajun wala AAalaanfusikum an ta/kuloo min buyootikum aw buyooti aba-ikumaw buyooti ommahatikum aw buyooti ikhwanikum awbuyooti akhawatikum aw buyooti aAAmamikum awbuyooti AAammatikum aw buyooti akhwalikum awbuyooti khalatikum aw ma malaktum mafatihahuaw sadeeqikum laysa AAalaykum junahun an ta/kuloojameeAAan aw ashtatan fa-itha dakhaltum buyootanfasallimoo AAala anfusikum tahiyyatan min AAindiAllahi mubarakatan tayyibatan kathalikayubayyinu Allahu lakumu al-ayati laAAallakumtaAAqiloon

24:62.t: Innama almu/minoona allatheenaamanoo billahi warasoolihi wa-itha kanoomaAAahu AAala amrin jamiAAin lam yathhaboo hattayasta/thinoohu inna allatheena yasta/thinoonakaola-ika allatheena yu/minoona billahiwarasoolihi fa-itha ista/thanooka libaAAdisha/nihim fa/than liman shi/ta minhum wastaghfirlahumu Allaha inna Allaha ghafoorun raheem

24:63.t: La tajAAaloo duAAaa arrasoolibaynakum kaduAAa-i baAAdikum baAAdan qadyaAAlamu Allahu allatheena yatasallaloona minkumliwathan falyahthari allatheena yukhalifoonaAAan amrihi an tuseebahum fitnatun aw yuseebahumAAathabun aleem

24:64.t: Ala inna lillahi ma feeassamawati wal-ardi qadyaAAlamu ma antum AAalayhi wayawma yurjaAAoona ilayhifayunabbi-ohum bima AAamiloo wallahubikulli shay-in AAaleem

25:1.t: Tabaraka allathee nazzalaalfurqana AAala AAabdihi liyakoona lilAAalameenanatheera

25:2.t: Allathee lahu mulku assamawatiwal-ardi walam yattakhith waladan walamyakun lahu shareekun fee almulki wakhalaqa kulla shay-infaqaddarahu taqdeera

25:3.t: Wattakhathoo min doonihi alihatanla yakhluqoona shay-an wahum yukhlaqoona walayamlikoona li-anfusihim darran wala nafAAan walayamlikoona mawtan wala hayatan walanushoora

25:4.t: Waqala allatheena kafaroo in hathailla ifkun iftarahu waaAAanahu AAalayhiqawmun akharoona faqad jaoo thulmanwazoora

25:5.t: Waqaloo asateeru al-awwaleenaiktatabaha fahiya tumla AAalayhi bukratan waaseela

25:6.t: Qul anzalahu allathee yaAAlamu assirrafee assamawati wal-ardiinnahu kana ghafooran raheema

25:7.t: Waqaloo mali hatha arrasooliya/kulu attaAAama wayamshee fee al-aswaqilawla onzila ilayhi malakun fayakoona maAAahu natheera

25:8.t: Aw yulqa ilayhi kanzun aw takoonu lahujannatun ya/kulu minha waqala aththalimoonain tattabiAAoona illa rajulan mashoora

25:9.t: Onthur kayfa daraboolaka al-amthala fadalloo fala yastateeAAoonasabeela

25:10.t: Tabaraka allathee in shaajaAAala laka khayran min thalika jannatin tajreemin tahtiha al-anharu wayajAAal laka qusoora

25:11.t: Bal kaththaboo bissaAAatiwaaAAtadna liman kaththaba bissaAAatisaAAeera

25:12.t: Itha raat-hum min makaninbaAAeedin samiAAoo laha taghayyuthanwazafeera

25:13.t: Wa-itha olqoo minha makanandayyiqan muqarraneena daAAaw hunalika thuboora

25:14.t: La tadAAoo alyawma thubooran wahidanwadAAoo thubooran katheera

25:15.t: Qul athalika khayrun am jannatualkhuldi allatee wuAAida almuttaqoona kanat lahum jazaanwamaseera

25:16.t: Lahum feeha ma yashaoonakhalideena kana AAala rabbika waAAdanmas-oola

25:17.t: Wayawma yahshuruhum wamayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi fayaqoolu aantum adlaltumAAibadee haola-i am hum dalloo assabeel

25:18.t: Qaloo subhanaka ma kanayanbaghee lana an nattakhitha min doonika min awliyaawalakin mattaAAtahum waabaahum hattanasoo aththikra wakanoo qawman boora

25:19.t: Faqad kaththabookum bimataqooloona fama tastateeAAoona sarfan walanasran waman yathlim minkum nuthiqhuAAathaban kabeera

25:20.t: Wama arsalna qablaka minaalmursaleena illa innahum laya/kuloona attaAAamawayamshoona fee al-aswaqi wajaAAalna baAAdakumlibaAAdin fitnatan atasbiroona wakanarabbuka baseera

25:21.t: Waqala allatheena layarjoona liqaana lawla onzila AAalaynaalmala-ikatu aw nara rabbana laqadiistakbaroo fee anfusihim waAAataw AAutuwwan kabeera

25:22.t: Yawma yarawna almala-ikata labushra yawma-ithin lilmujrimeena wayaqooloona hijranmahjoora

25:23.t: Waqadimna ila maAAamiloo min AAamalin fajaAAalnahu habaan manthoora

25:24.t: As-habu aljannati yawma-ithinkhayrun mustaqarran waahsanu maqeela

25:25.t: Wayawma tashaqqaqu assamao bilghamamiwanuzzila almala-ikatu tanzeela

25:26.t: Almulku yawma-ithin alhaqqu lirrahmaniwakana yawman AAala alkafireena AAaseera

25:27.t: Wayawma yaAAaddu aththalimuAAala yadayhi yaqoolu ya laytanee ittakhathtumaAAa arrasooli sabeela

25:29.t: Laqad adallanee AAani aththikribaAAda ith jaanee wakana ashshaytanulil-insani khathoola

25:30.t: Waqala arrasoolu yarabbi inna qawmee ittakhathoo hatha alqur-anamahjoora

25:31.t: Wakathalika jaAAalna likullinabiyyin AAaduwwan mina almujrimeena wakafa birabbika hadiyanwanaseera

25:32.t: Waqala allatheena kafaroo lawlanuzzila AAalayhi alqur-anu jumlatan wahidatan kathalikalinuthabbita bihi fu-adaka warattalnahu tarteela

25:33.t: Wala ya/toonaka bimathalin illaji/naka bilhaqqi waahsana tafseera

25:34.t: Allatheena yuhsharoona AAalawujoohihim ila jahannama ola-ika sharrun makananwaadallu sabeela

25:35.t: Walaqad atayna moosaalkitaba wajaAAalna maAAahu akhahu haroonawazeera

25:36.t: Faqulna ithhaba ilaalqawmi allatheena kaththaboo bi-ayatinafadammarnahum tadmeera

25:37.t: Waqawma noohin lamma kaththabooarrusula aghraqnahum wajaAAalnahum linnasiayatan waaAAtadna liththalimeenaAAathaban aleema

25:38.t: WaAAadan wathamooda waas-habaarrassi waquroonan bayna thalika katheera

25:39.t: Wakullan darabna lahu al-amthalawakullan tabbarna tatbeera

25:40.t: Walaqad ataw AAala alqaryati allateeomtirat matara assaw-i afalam yakoonooyarawnaha bal kanoo la yarjoona nushoora

25:41.t: Wa-itha raawka in yattakhithoonakailla huzuwan ahatha allathee baAAatha Allahurasoola

25:42.t: In kada layudillunaAAan alihatina lawla an sabarnaAAalayha wasawfa yaAAlamoona heena yarawna alAAathabaman adallu sabeela

25:43.t: Araayta mani ittakhatha ilahahuhawahu afaanta takoonu AAalayhi wakeela

25:44.t: Am tahsabu anna aktharahumyasmaAAoona aw yaAAqiloona in hum illa kal-anAAamibal hum adallu sabeela

25:45.t: Alam tara ila rabbika kayfa madda aththillawalaw shaa lajaAAalahu sakinan thumma jaAAalnaashshamsa AAalayhi daleela

25:47.t: Wahuwa allathee jaAAala lakumuallayla libasan wannawma subatan wajaAAalaannahara nushoora

25:48.t: Wahuwa allathee arsala arriyahabushran bayna yaday rahmatihi waanzalna mina assama-imaan tahoora

25:49.t: Linuhyiya bihi baldatan maytanwanusqiyahu mimma khalaqna anAAaman waanasiyyakatheera

25:50.t: Walaqad sarrafnahu baynahumliyaththakkaroo faaba aktharu annasiilla kufoora

25:51.t: Walaw shi/na labaAAathna feekulli qaryatin natheera

25:52.t: Fala tutiAAi alkafireenawajahidhum bihi jihadan kabeera

25:53.t: Wahuwa allathee maraja albahraynihatha AAathbun furatun wahatha milhunojajun wajaAAala baynahuma barzakhan wahijranmahjoora

25:54.t: Wahuwa allathee khalaqa mina alma-ibasharan fajaAAalahu nasaban wasihran wakanarabbuka qadeera

25:55.t: WayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi mala yanfaAAuhum wala yadurruhum wakanaalkafiru AAala rabbihi thaheera

25:57.t: Qul ma as-alukum AAalayhi min ajrinilla man shaa an yattakhitha ilarabbihi sabeela

25:58.t: Watawakkal AAala alhayyi allatheela yamootu wasabbih bihamdihi wakafabihi bithunoobi AAibadihi khabeera

25:59.t: Allathee khalaqa assamawatiwal-arda wama baynahuma fee sittatiayyamin thumma istawa AAala alAAarshi arrahmanufas-al bihi khabeera

25:60.t: Wa-itha qeela lahumu osjudoo lirrahmaniqaloo wama arrahmanu anasjudulima ta/muruna wazadahum nufoora

25:61.t: Tabaraka allathee jaAAala feeassama-i buroojan wajaAAala feeha sirajanwaqamaran muneera

25:62.t: Wahuwa allathee jaAAala allayla wannaharakhilfatan liman arada an yaththakkara aw aradashukoora

25:63.t: WaAAibadu arrahmaniallatheena yamshoona AAala al-ardi hawnanwa-itha khatabahumu aljahiloona qaloosalama

25:65.t: Wallatheena yaqooloona rabbanaisrif AAanna AAathaba jahannama inna AAathabahakana gharama

25:67.t: Wallatheena ithaanfaqoo lam yusrifoo walam yaqturoo wakana bayna thalikaqawama

25:68.t: Wallatheena layadAAoona maAAa Allahi ilahan akharawala yaqtuloona annafsa allatee harrama Allahuilla bilhaqqi wala yaznoona wamanyafAAal thalika yalqa athama

25:69.t: YudaAAaf lahu alAAathabu yawmaalqiyamati wayakhlud feehi muhana

25:70.t: Illa man taba waamanawaAAamila AAamalan salihan faola-ikayubaddilu Allahu sayyi-atihim hasanatinwakana Allahu ghafooran raheema

25:71.t: Waman taba waAAamila salihanfa-innahu yatoobu ila Allahi mataba

25:72.t: Wallatheena layashhadoona azzoora wa-itha marroo billaghwimarroo kirama

25:73.t: Wallatheena itha thukkiroobi-ayati rabbihim lam yakhirroo AAalayha summanwaAAumyana

25:74.t: Wallatheena yaqooloona rabbanahab lana min azwajina wathurriyyatinaqurrata aAAyunin wajAAalna lilmuttaqeena imama

25:75.t: Ola-ika yujzawna alghurfata bimasabaroo wayulaqqawna feeha tahiyyatan wasalama

25:77.t: Qul ma yaAAbao bikum rabbee lawladuAAaokum faqad kaththabtum fasawfa yakoonu lizama

26:4.t: In nasha/ nunazzil AAalayhim mina assama-iayatan fathallat aAAnaquhum lahakhadiAAeen

26:5.t: Wama ya/teehim min thikrin minaarrahmani muhdathin illa kanooAAanhu muAArideen

26:6.t: Faqad kaththaboo fasaya/teehim anbaoma kanoo bihi yastahzi-oon

26:7.t: Awa lam yaraw ila al-ardi kamanbatna feeha min kulli zawjin kareem

26:8.t: Inna fee thalika laayatan wamakana aktharuhum mu/mineen

26:10.t: Wa-ith nada rabbukamoosa ani i/ti alqawma aththalimeen

26:13.t: Wayadeequ sadree walayantaliqu lisanee faarsil ila haroon

26:15.t: Qala kalla fathhababi-ayatina inna maAAakum mustamiAAoon

26:16.t: Fa/tiya firAAawna faqoola innarasoolu rabbi alAAalameen

26:18.t: Qala alam nurabbika feenawaleedan walabithta feena min AAumurika sineen

26:19.t: WafaAAalta faAAlataka allatee faAAaltawaanta mina alkafireen

26:21.t: Fafarartu minkum lamma khiftukumfawahaba lee rabbee hukman wajaAAalanee mina almursaleen

26:22.t: Watilka niAAmatun tamunnuha AAalayyaan AAabbadta banee isra-eel

26:24.t: Qala rabbu assamawatiwal-ardi wama baynahuma in kuntummooqineen

26:27.t: Qala inna rasoolakumu allatheeorsila ilaykum lamajnoon

26:28.t: Qala rabbu almashriqi walmaghribiwama baynahuma in kuntum taAAqiloon

26:29.t: Qala la-ini ittakhathta ilahanghayree laajAAalannaka mina almasjooneen

26:30.t: Qala awa law ji/tuka bishay-in mubeen

26:31.t: Qala fa/ti bihi in kunta mina assadiqeen

26:34.t: Qala lilmala-i hawlahu inna hathalasahirun AAaleem

26:35.t: Yureedu an yukhrijakum min ardikumbisihrihi famatha ta/muroon

26:36.t: Qaloo arjih waakhahu wabAAathfee almada-ini hashireen

26:40.t: LaAAallana nattabiAAu assaharatain kanoo humu alghalibeen

26:41.t: Falamma jaa assaharatuqaloo lifirAAawna a-inna lana laajran in kunnanahnu alghalibeen

26:43.t: Qala lahum moosa alqoo maantum mulqoon

26:44.t: Faalqaw hibalahum waAAisiyyahumwaqaloo biAAizzati firAAawna inna lanahnualghaliboon

26:45.t: Faalqa moosa AAasahufa-itha hiya talqafu ma ya/fikoon

26:49.t: Qala amantum lahu qabla an athanalakum innahu lakabeerukumu allathee AAallamakumu assihrafalasawfa taAAlamoona laoqattiAAanna aydiyakum waarjulakummin khilafin walaosallibannakum ajmaAAeen

26:51.t: Inna natmaAAu an yaghfira lanarabbuna khatayana an kunnaawwala almu/mineen

26:52.t: Waawhayna ila moosaan asri biAAibadee innakum muttabaAAoon

26:61.t: Falamma taraa aljamAAaniqala as-habu moosa innalamudrakoon

26:63.t: Faawhayna ila moosaani idrib biAAasaka albahra fanfalaqafakana kullu firqin kattawdi alAAatheem

26:67.t: Inna fee thalika laayatan wamakana aktharuhum mu/mineen

26:82.t: Wallathee atmaAAu anyaghfira lee khatee-atee yawma addeen

26:93.t: Min dooni Allahi hal yansuroonakumaw yantasiroon

26:102.t: Falaw anna lana karratan fanakoonamina almu/mineen

26:103.t: Inna fee thalika laayatan wamakana aktharuhum mu/mineen

26:106.t: Ith qala lahum akhoohum noohunala tattaqoon

26:109.t: Wama as-alukum AAalayhi min ajrin inajriya illa AAala rabbi alAAalameen

26:113.t: In hisabuhum illa AAalarabbee law tashAAuroon

26:116.t: Qaloo la-in lam tantahi yanoohu latakoonanna mina almarjoomeen

26:118.t: Faftah baynee wabaynahum fathanwanajjinee waman maAAiya mina almu/mineen

26:121.t: Inna fee thalika laayatan wamakana aktharuhum mu/mineen

26:124.t: Ith qala lahum akhoohumhoodun ala tattaqoon

26:127.t: Wama as-alukum AAalayhi min ajrin inajriya illa AAala rabbi alAAalameen

26:136.t: Qaloo sawaon AAalaynaawaAAathta am lam takun mina alwaAAitheen

26:139.t: Fakaththaboohu faahlaknahuminna fee thalika laayatan wama kanaaktharuhum mu/mineen

26:142.t: Ith qala lahum akhoohum salihunala tattaqoon

26:145.t: Wama as-alukum AAalayhi min ajrin inajriya illa AAala rabbi alAAalameen

26:154.t: Ma anta illa basharun mithlunafa/ti bi-ayatin in kunta mina assadiqeena

26:155.t: Qala hathihi naqatunlaha shirbun walakum shirbu yawmin maAAloom

26:156.t: Wala tamassooha bisoo-infaya/khuthakum AAathabu yawmin AAatheem

26:158.t: Faakhathahumu alAAathabu innafee thalika laayatan wama kanaaktharuhum mu/mineen

26:161.t: Ith qala lahum akhoohum lootunala tattaqoon

26:164.t: Wama as-alukum AAalayhi min ajrin inajriya illa AAala rabbi alAAalameen

26:166.t: Watatharoona ma khalaqa lakumrabbukum min azwajikum bal antum qawmun AAadoon

26:167.t: Qaloo la-in lam tantahi yalootu latakoonanna mina almukhrajeen

26:180.t: Wama as-alukum AAalayhi min ajrin inajriya illa AAala rabbi alAAalameen

26:183.t: Wala tabkhasoo annasaashyaahum wala taAAthaw fee al-ardimufsideen

26:186.t: Wama anta illa basharunmithluna wa-in nathunnuka lamina alkathibeen

26:187.t: Faasqit AAalayna kisafan minaassama-i in kunta mina assadiqeen

26:189.t: Fakaththaboohu faakhathahumAAathabu yawmi aththullati innahu kanaAAathaba yawmin AAatheem

26:190.t: Inna fee thalika laayatan wamakana aktharuhum mu/mineen

26:197.t: Awa lam yakun lahum ayatan anyaAAlamahu AAulamao banee isra-eel

26:201.t: La yu/minoona bihi hattayarawoo alAAathaba al-aleem

26:208.t: Wama ahlakna min qaryatin illalaha munthiroon

26:213.t: Fala tadAAu maAAa Allahi ilahanakhara fatakoona mina almuAAaththabeen

26:216.t: Fa-in AAasawka faqul innee baree-onmimma taAAmaloon

26:225.t: Alam tara annahum fee kulli wadinyaheemoon

26:227.t: Illa allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati wathakaroo Allahakatheeran wantasaroo min baAAdi ma thulimoowasayaAAlamu allatheena thalamoo ayyamunqalabin yanqaliboon

27:3.t: Allatheena yuqeemoona assalatawayu/toona azzakata wahum bil-akhiratihum yooqinoon

27:4.t: Inna allatheena la yu/minoonabil-akhirati zayyanna lahum aAAmalahumfahum yaAAmahoon

27:5.t: Ola-ika allatheena lahum soo-oalAAathabi wahum fee al-akhirati humu al-akhsaroon

27:6.t: Wa-innaka latulaqqa alqur-anamin ladun hakeemin AAaleem

27:10.t: Waalqi AAasaka falamma raahatahtazzu kaannaha jannun walla mudbiranwalam yuAAaqqib ya moosa la takhaf innee layakhafu ladayya almursaloon

27:11.t: Illa man thalama thummabaddala husnan baAAda soo-in fa-innee ghafoorun raheem

27:12.t: Waadkhil yadaka fee jaybika takhruj baydaamin ghayri soo-in fee tisAAi ayatin ilafirAAawna waqawmihi innahum kanoo qawman fasiqeen

27:13.t: Falamma jaat-hum ayatunamubsiratan qaloo hatha sihrun mubeen

27:14.t: Wajahadoo biha wastayqanat-haanfusuhum thulman waAAuluwwan fanthurkayfa kana AAaqibatu almufsideen

27:15.t: Walaqad atayna dawoodawasulaymana AAilman waqala alhamdulillahi allathee faddalana AAalakatheerin min AAibadihi almu/mineen

27:16.t: Wawaritha sulaymanu dawoodawaqala ya ayyuha annasuAAullimna mantiqa attayri waooteenamin kulli shay-in inna hatha lahuwa alfadlualmubeen

27:17.t: Wahushira lisulaymanajunooduhu mina aljinni wal-insi wattayrifahum yoozaAAoon

27:18.t: Hatta itha ataw AAalawadi annamli qalat namlatun ya ayyuhaannamlu odkhuloo masakinakum la yahtimannakumsulaymanu wajunooduhu wahum la yashAAuroon

27:19.t: Fatabassama dahikan min qawlihawaqala rabbi awziAAnee an ashkura niAAmataka allateeanAAamta AAalayya waAAala walidayya waan aAAmala salihantardahu waadkhilnee birahmatika fee AAibadikaassaliheen

27:20.t: Watafaqqada attayra faqalama liya la ara alhudhuda am kana minaalgha-ibeen

27:21.t: LaoAAaththibannahu AAathabanshadeedan aw laathbahannahu aw laya/tiyannee bisultaninmubeen

27:22.t: Famakatha ghayra baAAeedin faqala ahattubima lam tuhit bihi waji/tuka min saba-inbinaba-in yaqeen

27:23.t: Innee wajadtu imraatan tamlikuhum waootiyatmin kulli shay-in walaha AAarshun AAatheem

27:24.t: Wajadtuha waqawmaha yasjudoonalishshamsi min dooni Allahi wazayyana lahumu ashshaytanuaAAmalahum fasaddahum AAani assabeeli fahumla yahtadoon

27:25.t: Alla yasjudoo lillahi allatheeyukhriju alkhabaa fee assamawati wal-ardiwayaAAlamu ma tukhfoona wama tuAAlinoon

27:26.t: Allahu la ilaha illahuwa rabbu alAAarshi alAAatheem

27:27.t: Qala sananthuru asadaqtaam kunta mina alkathibeen

27:28.t: Ithhab bikitabee hathafaalqih ilayhim thumma tawalla AAanhum fanthurmatha yarjiAAoon

27:29.t: Qalat ya ayyuha almalaoinnee olqiya ilayya kitabun kareem

27:30.t: Innahu min sulaymana wa-innahu bismiAllahi arrahmani arraheem

27:32.t: Qalat ya ayyuha almalaoaftoonee fee amree ma kuntu qatiAAatan amran hattatashhadoon

27:33.t: Qaloo nahnu oloo quwwatinwaoloo ba/sin shadeedin wal-amru ilayki fanthureematha ta/mureen

27:34.t: Qalat inna almulooka ithadakhaloo qaryatan afsadooha wajaAAaloo aAAizzata ahlihaathillatan wakathalika yafAAaloon

27:35.t: Wa-innee mursilatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanathiratunbima yarjiAAu almursaloon

27:36.t: Falamma jaa sulaymana qalaatumiddoonani bimalin fama ataniyaAllahu khayrun mimma atakum bal antumbihadiyyatikum tafrahoon

27:37.t: IrjiAA ilayhim falana/tiyannahum bijunoodinla qibala lahum biha walanukhrijannahum minhaathillatan wahum saghiroon

27:38.t: Qala ya ayyuha almalaoayyukum ya/teenee biAAarshiha qabla an ya/toonee muslimeen

27:39.t: Qala AAifreetun mina aljinni anaateeka bihi qabla an taqooma min maqamika wa-inneAAalayhi laqawiyyun ameen

27:40.t: Qala allathee AAindahu AAilmunmina alkitabi ana ateeka bihi qabla anyartadda ilayka tarfuka falamma raahumustaqirran AAindahu qala hatha min fadlirabbee liyabluwanee aashkuru am akfuru waman shakara fa-innamayashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fa-inna rabbee ghaniyyun kareem

27:41.t: Qala nakkiroo laha AAarshahananthur atahtadee am takoonu mina allatheenala yahtadoon

27:42.t: Falamma jaat qeela ahakathaAAarshuki qalat kaannahu huwa waooteena alAAilmamin qabliha wakunna muslimeen

27:43.t: Wasaddaha ma kanattaAAbudu min dooni Allahi innaha kanat minqawmin kafireen

27:44.t: Qeela laha odkhulee assarhafalamma raat-hu hasibat-hu lujjatan wakashafat AAansaqayha qala innahu sarhunmumarradun min qawareera qalat rabbi innee thalamtunafsee waaslamtu maAAa sulaymana lillahi rabbi alAAalameen

27:45.t: Walaqad arsalna ila thamoodaakhahum salihan ani oAAbudoo Allahafa-itha hum fareeqani yakhtasimoon

27:46.t: Qala ya qawmi limatastaAAjiloona bissayyi-ati qabla alhasanati lawlatastaghfiroona Allaha laAAallakum turhamoon

27:47.t: Qaloo ittayyarna bikawabiman maAAaka qala ta-irukum AAinda Allahibal antum qawmun tuftanoon

27:48.t: Wakana fee almadeenati tisAAatu rahtinyufsidoona fee al-ardi wala yuslihoon

27:49.t: Qaloo taqasamoo billahilanubayyitannahu waahlahu thumma lanaqoolanna liwaliyyihi mashahidna mahlika ahlihi wa-inna lasadiqoon

27:51.t: Fanthur kayfa kanaAAaqibatu makrihim anna dammarnahumwaqawmahum ajmaAAeen

27:52.t: Fatilka buyootuhum khawiyatan bimathalamoo inna fee thalika laayatanliqawmin yaAAlamoon

27:54.t: Walootan ith qalaliqawmihi ata/toona alfahishata waantum tubsiroon

27:55.t: A-innakum lata/toona arrijalashahwatan min dooni annisa-i bal antum qawmuntajhaloon

27:56.t: Fama kana jawabaqawmihi illa an qaloo akhrijoo ala lootinmin qaryatikum innahum onasun yatatahharoon

27:57.t: Faanjaynahu waahlahu illaimraatahu qaddarnaha mina alghabireen

27:59.t: Quli alhamdu lillahi wasalamunAAala AAibadihi allatheena istafaallahu khayrun amma yushrikoon

27:60.t: Amman khalaqa assamawatiwal-arda waanzala lakum mina assama-imaan faanbatna bihi hada-iqa thatabahjatin ma kana lakum an tunbitoo shajarahaa-ilahun maAAa Allahi bal hum qawmun yaAAdiloon

27:61.t: Amman jaAAala al-arda qararanwajaAAala khilalaha anharan wajaAAala laharawasiya wajaAAala bayna albahrayni hajizana-ilahun maAAa Allahi bal aktharuhum layaAAlamoon

27:62.t: Amman yujeebu almudtarra ithadaAAahu wayakshifu assoo-a wayajAAalukum khulafaaal-ardi a-ilahun maAAa Allahi qaleelan matathakkaroon

27:63.t: Amman yahdeekum fee thulumatialbarri walbahri waman yursilu arriyahabushran bayna yaday rahmatihi a-ilahun maAAa AllahitaAAala Allahu AAamma yushrikoon

27:64.t: Amman yabdao alkhalqa thumma yuAAeeduhuwaman yarzuqukum mina assama-i wal-ardia-ilahun maAAa Allahi qul hatoo burhanakumin kuntum sadiqeen

27:65.t: Qul la yaAAlamu man fee assamawatiwal-ardi alghayba illa Allahu wamayashAAuroona ayyana yubAAathoon

27:66.t: Bali iddaraka AAilmuhum fee al-akhiratibal hum fee shakkin minha bal hum minha AAamoon

27:67.t: Waqala allatheena kafaroo a-ithakunna turaban waabaona a-innalamukhrajoon

27:68.t: Laqad wuAAidna hatha nahnuwaabaona min qablu in hatha illaasateeru al-awwaleen

27:69.t: Qul seeroo fee al-ardi fanthurookayfa kana AAaqibatu almujrimeen

1:7.t: Sirata allatheena anAAamta AAalayhim ghayri almaghdoobi AAalayhim wala addalleen

10:94.t: Fa-in kunta fee shakkin mimma anzalnnailayka fas-ali allatheena yaqraoona alkitabamin qablika laqad jaaka alhaqqu min rabbika falatakoonanna mina almumtareen

10:95.t: Wala takoonanna mina allatheenakaththaboo bi-ayati Allahi fatakoonamina alkhasireen

10:96.t: Inna allatheena haqqatAAalayhim kalimatu rabbika la yu/minoon

10:97.t: Walaw jaat-hum kullu ayatin hattayarawoo alAAathaba al-aleem

10:98.t: Falawla kanat qaryatun amanatfanafaAAaha eemanuha illa qawmayoonusa lamma amanoo kashafna AAanhum AAathabaalkhizyi fee alhayati addunyawamattaAAnahum ila heen

10:99.t: Walaw shaa rabbuka laamana manfee al-ardi kulluhum jameeAAan afaanta tukrihu annasahatta yakoonoo mu/mineen

11:1.t: Alif-lam-ra kitabun ohkimatayatuhu thumma fussilat min ladun hakeeminkhabeer

11:2.t: Alla taAAbudoo illa Allahainnanee lakum minhu natheerun wabasheer

11:3.t: Waani istaghfiroo rabbakum thumma toobooilayhi yumattiAAkum mataAAan hasanan ilaajalin musamman wayu/ti kulla thee fadlin fadlahuwa-in tawallaw fa-inee akhafu AAalaykum AAathabayawmin kabeer

11:4.t: Ila Allahi marjiAAukum wahuwaAAala kulli shay-in qadeer

11:5.t: Ala innahum yathnoona sudoorahumliyastakhfoo minhu ala heena yastaghshoona thiyabahumyaAAlamu ma yusirroona wama yuAAlinoona innahuAAaleemun bithati assudoor

11:6.t: Wama min dabbatin fee al-ardiilla AAala Allahi rizquha wayaAAlamumustaqarraha wamustawdaAAaha kullun fee kitabinmubeen

11:7.t: Wahuwa allathee khalaqa assamawatiwal-arda fee sittati ayyamin wakanaAAarshuhu AAala alma-i liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanuAAamalan wala-in qulta innakum mabAAoothoona min baAAdi almawtilayaqoolanna allatheena kafaroo in hatha illasihrun mubeen

11:8.t: Wala-in akhkharna AAanhumu alAAathabaila ommatin maAAdoodatin layaqoolunna ma yahbisuhuala yawma ya/teehim laysa masroofan AAanhum wahaqabihim ma kanoo bihi yastahzi-oon

11:9.t: Wala-in athaqna al-insanaminna rahmatan thumma nazaAAnahaminhu innahu layaoosun kafoor

11:10.t: Wala-in athaqnahu naAAmaabaAAda darraa massat-hu layaqoolanna thahabaassayyi-atu AAannee innahu lafarihunfakhoor

11:11.t: Illa allatheena sabaroowaAAamiloo assalihati ola-ika lahummaghfiratun waajrun kabeer

11:12.t: FalaAAallaka tarikun baAAda mayooha ilayka wada-iqun bihi sadruka anyaqooloo lawla onzila AAalayhi kanzun aw jaamaAAahu malakun innama anta natheerun wallahuAAala kulli shay-in wakeel

11:13.t: Am yaqooloona iftarahu qul fa/toobiAAashri suwarin mithlihi muftarayatin wadAAoomani istataAAtum min dooni Allahi in kuntum sadiqeen

11:14.t: Fa-illam yastajeeboo lakum faAAlamooannama onzila biAAilmi Allahi waan la ilahailla huwa fahal antum muslimoon

11:15.t: Man kana yureedu alhayataaddunya wazeenataha nuwaffi ilayhim aAAmalahumfeeha wahum feeha la yubkhasoon

11:16.t: Ola-ika allatheena laysa lahumfee al-akhirati illa annaru wahabitama sanaAAoo feeha wabatilun makanoo yaAAmaloon

11:17.t: Afaman kana AAala bayyinatinmin rabbihi wayatloohu shahidun minhu wamin qablihi kitabumoosa imaman warahmatan ola-ikayu/minoona bihi waman yakfur bihi mina al-ahzabi fannarumawAAiduhu fala taku fee miryatin minhu innahu alhaqqumin rabbika walakinna akthara annasi layu/minoon

11:18.t: Waman athlamu mimmani iftaraAAala Allahi kathiban ola-ika yuAAradoonaAAala rabbihim wayaqoolu al-ashhadu haola-iallatheena kathaboo AAala rabbihim alalaAAnatu Allahi AAala aththalimeen

11:19.t: Allatheena yasuddoona AAansabeeli Allahi wayabghoonaha AAiwajan wahum bil-akhiratihum kafiroon

11:20.t: Ola-ika lam yakoonoo muAAjizeena feeal-ardi wama kana lahum min dooni Allahimin awliyaa yudaAAafu lahumu alAAathabu makanoo yastateeAAoona assamAAa wama kanooyubsiroon

11:21.t: Ola-ika allatheena khasirooanfusahum wadalla AAanhum ma kanoo yaftaroon

11:22.t: La jarama annahum fee al-akhiratihumu al-akhsaroon

11:23.t: Inna allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo asalihati waakhbatoo ilarabbihim ola-ika as-habu aljannati hum feehakhalidoon

11:24.t: Mathalu alfareeqayni kalaAAmawal-asammi walbaseeri wassameeAAihal yastawiyani mathalan afala tathakkaroon

11:25.t: Walaqad arsalna noohan ilaqawmihi innee lakum natheerun mubeen

11:26.t: An la taAAbudoo illa Allahainnee akhafu AAalaykum AAathaba yawmin aleem

11:27.t: Faqala almalao allatheenakafaroo min qawmihi ma naraka illa basharanmithlana wama naraka ittabaAAaka illaallatheena hum arathiluna badiya arra/yiwama nara lakum AAalayna min fadlinbal nathunnukum kathibeen

11:28.t: Qala ya qawmi araaytum inkuntu AAala bayyinatin min rabbee waataneerahmatan min AAindihi faAAummiyat AAalaykum anulzimukumoohawaantum laha karihoon

11:29.t: Waya qawmi la as-alukumAAalayhi malan in ajriya illa AAala Allahiwama ana bitaridi allatheena amanooinnahum mulaqoo rabbihim walakinnee arakumqawman tajhaloon

11:30.t: Waya qawmi man yansurunee minaAllahi in taradtuhum afala tathakkaroon

11:31.t: Wala aqoolu lakum AAindee khaza-inuAllahi wala aAAlamu alghayba wala aqooluinnee malakun wala aqoolu lillatheena tazdareeaAAyunukum lan yu/tiyahumu Allahu khayran AllahuaAAlamu bima fee anfusihim innee ithan lamina aththalimeen

11:32.t: Qaloo ya noohu qad jadaltanafaaktharta jidalana fa/tina bimataAAiduna in kunta mina assadiqeen

11:33.t: Qala innama ya/teekum bihi Allahuin shaa wama antum bimuAAjizeen

11:34.t: Wala yanfaAAukum nushee inaradtu an ansaha lakum in kana Allahuyureedu an yughwiyakum huwa rabbukum wa-ilayhi turjaAAoon

11:35.t: Am yaqooloona iftarahu qul iniiftaraytuhu faAAalayya ijramee waana baree-on mimmatujrimoon

11:36.t: Waoohiya ila noohinannahu lan yu/mina min qawmika illa man qad amanafala tabta-is bima kanoo yafAAaloon

11:37.t: WasnaAAi alfulka bi-aAAyuninawawahyina wala tukhatibnee fee allatheenathalamoo innahum mughraqoon

11:38.t: WayasnaAAu alfulka wakullamamarra AAalayhi malaon min qawmihi sakhiroo minhu qala intaskharoo minna fa-inna naskharu minkum kamataskharoon

11:39.t: Fasawfa taAAlamoona man ya/teehi AAathabunyukhzeehi wayahillu AAalayhi AAathabun muqeem

11:40.t: Hatta itha jaaamruna wafara attannooru qulna ihmilfeeha min kullin zawjayni ithnayni waahlaka illaman sabaqa AAalayhi alqawlu waman amana wama amanamaAAahu illa qaleel

11:41.t: Waqala irkaboo feeha bismi Allahimajraha wamursaha inna rabbeelaghafoorun raheem

11:42.t: Wahiya tajree bihim fee mawjin kaljibaliwanada noohunu ibnahu wakana feemaAAzilin ya bunayya irkab maAAana walatakun maAAa alkafireen

11:43.t: Qala saawee ila jabalinyaAAsimunee mina alma-i qala la AAasimaalyawma min amri Allahi illa man rahima wahalabaynahuma almawju fakana mina almughraqeen

11:44.t: Waqeela ya ardu iblaAAee maakiwaya samao aqliAAee wagheeda almaowaqudiya al-amru wastawat AAala aljoodiyyiwaqeela buAAdan lilqawmi aththalimeen

11:45.t: Wanada noohun rabbahufaqala rabbi inna ibnee min ahlee wa-inna waAAdaka alhaqquwaanta ahkamu alhakimeen

11:46.t: Qala ya noohu innahulaysa min ahlika innahu AAamalun ghayru salihin falatas-alni ma laysa laka bihi AAilmun innee aAAithukaan takoona mina aljahileen

11:47.t: Qala rabbi innee aAAoothu bikaan as-alaka ma laysa lee bihi AAilmun wa-illataghfir lee watarhamnee akun mina alkhasireen

11:48.t: Qeela ya noohu ihbitbisalamin minna wabarakatin AAalayka waAAalaomamin mimman maAAaka waomamun sanumattiAAuhum thumma yamassuhumminna AAathabun aleem

11:49.t: Tilka min anba-i alghaybi nooheehailayka ma kunta taAAlamuha anta wala qawmukamin qabli hatha fasbir inna alAAaqibatalilmuttaqeen

11:50.t: Wa-ila AAadin akhahumhoodan qala ya qawmi oAAbudoo Allaha malakum min ilahin ghayruhu in antum illa muftaroon

11:51.t: Ya qawmi la as-alukum AAalayhiajran in ajriya illa AAala allathee fataraneeafala taAAqiloon

11:52.t: Waya qawmi istaghfiroo rabbakumthumma tooboo ilayhi yursili assamaa AAalaykummidraran wayazidkum quwwatan ila quwwatikum walatatawallaw mujrimeen

11:53.t: Qaloo ya hoodu maji/tana bibayyinatin wama nahnu bitarikeealihatina AAan qawlika wama nahnulaka bimu/mineen

11:54.t: In naqoolu illa iAAtaraka baAAdualihatina bisoo-in qala innee oshhidu Allahawashhadoo annee baree-on mimma tushrikoon

11:55.t: Min doonihi fakeedoonee jameeAAan thumma latunthiroon

11:56.t: Innee tawakkaltu AAala Allahirabbee warabbikum ma min dabbatin illa huwa akhithunbinasiyatiha inna rabbee AAala siratinmustaqeem

11:57.t: Fa-in tawallaw faqad ablaghtukum maorsiltu bihi ilaykum wayastakhlifu rabbee qawman ghayrakum walatadurroonahu shay-an inna rabbee AAala kullishay-in hafeeth

11:58.t: Walamma jaa amrunanajjayna hoodan wallatheena amanoomaAAahu birahmatin minna wanajjaynahum minAAathabin ghaleeth

11:59.t: Watilka AAadun jahadoo bi-ayatirabbihim waAAasaw rusulahu wattabaAAoo amra kullijabbarin AAaneed

11:60.t: WaotbiAAoo fee hathihi addunyalaAAnatan wayawma alqiyamati ala inna AAadankafaroo rabbahum ala buAAdan liAAadin qawmi hood

11:61.t: Wa-ila thamooda akhahum salihanqala ya qawmi oAAbudoo Allaha malakum min ilahin ghayruhu huwa anshaakum mina al-ardiwastaAAmarakum feeha fastaghfiroohu thummatooboo ilayhi inna rabbee qareebun mujeeb

11:62.t: Qaloo ya salihuqad kunta feena marjuwwan qabla hatha atanhanaan naAAbuda ma yaAAbudu abaonawa-innana lafee shakkin mimma tadAAoonailayhi mureeb

11:63.t: Qala ya qawmi araaytum inkuntu AAala bayyinatin min rabbee waataneeminhu rahmatan faman yansurunee mina Allahiin AAasaytuhu fama tazeedoonanee ghayra takhseer

11:64.t: Waya qawmi hathihi naqatuAllahi lakum ayatan fatharooha ta/kulfee ardi Allahi wala tamassoohabisoo-in faya/khuthakum AAathabun qareeb

11:65.t: FaAAaqarooha faqalatamattaAAoo fee darikum thalathata ayyamin thalikawaAAdun ghayru makthoob

11:66.t: Falamma jaa amrunanajjayna salihan wallatheena amanoomaAAahu birahmatin minna wamin khizyi yawmi-ithininna rabbaka huwa alqawiyyu alAAazeez

11:67.t: Waakhatha allatheena thalamooassayhatu faasbahoo fee diyarihimjathimeen

11:68.t: Kaan lam yaghnaw feeha alainna thamooda kafaroo rabbahum ala buAAdan lithamood

11:69.t: Walaqad jaat rusuluna ibraheemabilbushra qaloo salaman qalasalamun fama labitha an jaa biAAijlin haneeth

11:70.t: Falamma raa aydiyahum latasilu ilayhi nakirahum waawjasa minhum kheefatan qaloola takhaf inna orsilna ila qawmi loot

11:71.t: Wamraatuhu qa-imatun fadahikatfabashsharnaha bi-ishaqa wamin wara-iishaqa yaAAqoob

11:72.t: Qalat ya waylata aaliduwaana AAajoozun wahatha baAAlee shaykhan inna hathalashay-on AAajeeb

11:73.t: Qaloo ataAAjabeena min amri Allahirahmatu Allahi wabarakatuhu AAalaykum ahlaalbayti innahu hameedun majeed

11:74.t: Falamma thahaba AAan ibraheemaarrawAAu wajaat-hu albushra yujadilunafee qawmi loot

11:76.t: Ya ibraheemu aAAridAAan hatha innahu qad jaa amru rabbika wa-innahum ateehimAAathabun ghayru mardood

11:77.t: Walamma jaat rusulunalootan see-a bihim wadaqa bihim tharAAan waqalahatha yawmun AAaseeb

11:78.t: Wajaahu qawmuhu yuhraAAoona ilayhiwamin qablu kanoo yaAAmaloona assayyi-ati qalaya qawmi haola-i banatee hunna atharulakum fattaqoo Allaha wala tukhzooni fee dayfeealaysa minkum rajulun rasheed

11:79.t: Qaloo laqad AAalimta ma lanafee banatika min haqqin wa-innaka lataAAlamu manureed

11:80.t: Qala law anna lee bikum quwwatan aw aweeila ruknin shadeed

11:81.t: Qaloo ya lootu innarusulu rabbika lan yasiloo ilayka faasri bi-ahlika biqitAAinmina allayli wala yaltafit minkum ahadun illaimraataka innahu museebuha ma asabahuminna mawAAidahumu assubhu alaysa assubhubiqareeb

11:82.t: Falamma jaa amrunajaAAalna AAaliyaha safilahawaamtarna AAalayha hijaratanmin sijjeelin mandood

11:83.t: Musawwamatan AAinda rabbika wama hiyamina aththalimeena bibaAAeed

11:84.t: Wa-ila madyana akhahumshuAAayban qala ya qawmi oAAbudoo Allaha malakum min ilahin ghayruhu wala tanqusooalmikyala walmeezana innee arakumbikhayrin wa-innee akhafu AAalaykum AAathaba yawminmuheet

11:85.t: Waya qawmi awfoo almikyala walmeezanabilqisti wala tabkhasoo annasaashyaahum wala taAAthaw fee al-ardimufsideen

11:86.t: Baqiyyatu Allahi khayrun lakum inkuntum mu/mineena wama ana AAalaykum bihafeeth

11:87.t: Qaloo ya shuAAaybu asalatukata/muruka an natruka ma yaAAbudu abaonaaw an nafAAala fee amwalina ma nashaoinnaka laanta alhaleemu arrasheed

11:88.t: Qala ya qawmi araaytum inkuntu AAala bayyinatin min rabbee warazaqanee minhu rizqanhasanan wama oreedu an okhalifakum ilama anhakum AAanhu in oreedu illa al-islahama istataAAtu wama tawfeeqee illa billahiAAalayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi oneeb

11:89.t: Waya qawmi la yajrimannakumshiqaqee an yuseebakum mithlu ma asabaqawma noohin aw qawma hoodin aw qawma salihinwama qawmu lootin minkum bibaAAeed

11:90.t: Wastaghfiroo rabbakum thumma toobooilayhi inna rabbee raheemun wadood

11:91.t: Qaloo ya shuAAaybu manafqahu katheeran mimma taqoolu wa-inna lanarakafeena daAAeefan walawla rahtukalarajamnaka wama anta AAalayna biAAazeez

11:92.t: Qala ya qawmi arahteeaAAazzu AAalaykum mina Allahi wattakhathtumoohuwaraakum thihriyyan inna rabbee bimataAAmaloona muheet

11:93.t: Waya qawmi iAAmaloo AAala makanatikuminnee AAamilun sawfa taAAlamoona man ya/teehi AAathabunyukhzeehi waman huwa kathibun wartaqiboo innemaAAakum raqeeb

11:94.t: Walamma jaa amrunanajjayna shuAAayban wallatheena amanoomaAAahu birahmatin minna waakhathati allatheenathalamoo assayhatu faasbahoofee diyarihim jathimeen

11:95.t: Kaan lam yaghnaw feeha alabuAAdan limadyana kama baAAidat thamood

11:97.t: Ila firAAawna wamala-ihi fattabaAAooamra firAAawna wama amru firAAawna birasheed

11:98.t: Yaqdumu qawmahu yawma alqiyamatifaawradahumu annara wabi/sa alwirdu almawrood

11:99.t: WaotbiAAoo fee hathihi laAAnatanwayawma alqiyamati bi/sa arrifdu almarfood

11:100.t: Thalika min anba-i alquranaqussuhu AAalayka minha qa-imun wahaseed

11:101.t: Wama thalamnahumwalakin thalamoo anfusahum famaaghnat AAanhum alihatuhumu allatee yadAAoona min dooni Allahimin shay-in lamma jaa amru rabbika wama zadoohumghayra tatbeeb

11:102.t: Wakathalika akhthu rabbika ithaakhatha alqura wahiya thalimatuninna akhthahu aleemun shadeed

11:103.t: Inna fee thalika laayatanliman khafa AAathaba al-akhirati thalikayawmun majmooAAun lahu annasu wathalikayawmun mashhoodun

11:105.t: Yawma ya/ti la takallamu nafsun illabi-ithnihi faminhum shaqiyyun wasaAAeed

11:106.t: Faamma allatheena shaqoofafee annari lahum feeha zafeerun washaheeq

11:107.t: Khalideena feeha ma damatiassamawatu wal-ardu illama shaa rabbuka inna rabbaka faAAAAalun limayureed

11:108.t: Waamma allatheena suAAidoofafee aljannati khalideena feeha ma damatiassamawatu wal-ardu illama shaa rabbuka AAataan ghayra majthooth

11:109.t: Fala taku fee miryatin mimmayaAAbudu haola-i ma yaAAbudoona illakama yaAAbudu abaohum min qablu wa-innalamuwaffoohum naseebahum ghayra manqoos

11:110.t: Walaqad atayna moosaalkitaba fakhtulifa feehi walawla kalimatunsabaqat min rabbika laqudiya baynahum wa-innahum lafeeshakkin minhu mureeb

11:111.t: Wa-inna kullan lammalayuwaffiyannahum rabbuka aAAmalahum innahu bimayaAAmaloona khabeer

11:113.t: Wala tarkanoo ila allatheenathalamoo fatamassakumu annaru wamalakum min dooni Allahi min awliyaa thumma latunsaroon

11:114.t: Waaqimi assalata tarafayiannahari wazulafan mina allayli inna alhasanatiyuthhibna assayyi-ati thalika thikraliththakireen

11:115.t: Wasbir fa-inna Allahala yudeeAAu ajra almuhsineen

11:116.t: Falawla kana mina alquroonimin qablikum oloo baqiyyatin yanhawna AAani alfasadi feeal-ardi illa qaleelan mimman anjayna minhumwattabaAAa allatheena thalamoo maotrifoo feehi wakanoo mujrimeen

11:117.t: Wama kana rabbuka liyuhlikaalqura bithulmin waahluha muslihoon

11:118.t: Walaw shaa rabbuka lajaAAala annasaommatan wahidatan wala yazaloonamukhtalifeen

11:119.t: Illa man rahima rabbuka walithalikakhalaqahum watammat kalimatu rabbika laamlaanna jahannama minaaljinnati wannasi ajmaAAeen

11:120.t: Wakullan naqussu AAalayka min anba-iarrusuli ma nuthabbitu bihi fu-adaka wajaakafee hathihi alhaqqu wamawAAithatun wathikralilmu/mineen

11:121.t: Waqul lillatheena layu/minoona iAAmaloo AAala makanatikum innaAAamiloon

11:123.t: Walillahi ghaybu assamawatiwal-ardi wa-ilayhi yurjaAAu al-amru kulluhu faAAbudhuwatawakkal AAalayhi wama rabbuka bighafilin AAammataAAmaloon

12:3.t: Nahnu naqussu AAalayka ahsanaalqasasi bima awhayna ilayka hathaalqur-ana wa-in kunta min qablihi lamina alghafileen

12:4.t: Ith qala yoosufu li-abeehi yaabati innee raaytu ahada AAashara kawkaban washshamsawalqamara raaytuhum lee sajideen

12:5.t: Qala ya bunayya la taqsusru/yaka AAala ikhwatika fayakeedoo laka kaydan innaashshaytana lil-insani AAaduwwun mubeen

12:6.t: Wakathalika yajtabeeka rabbukawayuAAallimuka min ta/weeli al-ahadeethi wayutimmuniAAmatahu AAalayka waAAala ali yaAAqooba kamaatammaha AAala abawayka min qablu ibraheemawa-ishaqa inna rabbaka AAaleemun hakeem

12:7.t: Laqad kana fee yoosufa wa-ikhwatihi ayatunlissa-ileen

12:8.t: Ith qaloo layoosufu waakhoohu ahabbuila abeena minna wanahnu AAusbatuninna abana lafee dalalin mubeen

12:9.t: Oqtuloo yoosufa awi itrahoohuardan yakhlu lakum wajhu abeekum watakoonoo min baAAdihiqawman saliheen

12:10.t: Qala qa-ilun minhum lataqtuloo yoosufa waalqoohu fee ghayabati aljubbi yaltaqithubaAAdu assayyarati in kuntum faAAileen

12:11.t: Qaloo ya abana malaka la ta/manna AAala yoosufa wa-innalahu lanasihoon

12:12.t: Arsilhu maAAana ghadan yartaAAwayalAAab wa-inna lahu lahafithoon

12:13.t: Qala innee layahzununee an thathhaboobihi waakhafu an ya/kulahu aththi/buwaantum AAanhu ghafiloon

12:14.t: Qaloo la-in akalahu aththi/buwanahnu AAusbatun inna ithan lakhasiroon

12:15.t: Falamma thahaboo bihiwaajmaAAoo an yajAAaloohu fee ghayabati aljubbi waawhaynailayhi latunabi-annahum bi-amrihim hatha wahum layashAAuroon

12:17.t: Qaloo ya abanainna thahabna nastabiqu wataraknayoosufa AAinda mataAAina faakalahu aththi/buwama anta bimu/minin lana walaw kunna sadiqeen

12:18.t: Wajaoo AAala qameesihibidamin kathibin qala bal sawwalat lakum anfusukumamran fasabrun jameelun wallahu almustaAAanuAAala ma tasifoon

12:19.t: Wajaat sayyaratun faarsaloo waridahumfaadla dalwahu qala ya bushra hathaghulamun waasarroohu bidaAAatan wallahuAAaleemun bima yaAAmaloon

12:20.t: Washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darahimamaAAdoodatin wakanoo feehi mina azzahideen

12:21.t: Waqala allathee ishtarahumin misra limraatihi akrimee mathwahu AAasaan yanfaAAana aw nattakhithahu waladan wakathalikamakkanna liyoosufa fee al-ardi walinuAAallimahu minta/weeli al-ahadeethi wallahu ghalibunAAala amrihi walakinna akthara annasila yaAAlamoon

12:22.t: Walamma balagha ashuddahu ataynahuhukman waAAilman wakathalika najzee almuhsineen
